65b8: yin par rig par bya na/ bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang ting nge 'dzin 'di lung nod par byed/ kun chub par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed la/ lung mnod pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / bcang bar bya ba dang / klag

66a1: par byas nas kyang gzhan dag la ston par byed/ / sgrogs par byed/ yang dag par sgrogs par byed cing bsgom pa'i sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs/
66a2: su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i mchog/ seng ge'i blo gros shes bya rjes dran te// der ni mi yi dbang po rgyal po des// ting 'dzin 'di ni de tshe thos par gyur// rgyal pos ting 'dzin 'di ni thos nas
66a3: kyang / / sems mgu dga' ba dpe med pas bzung ste// mi mchog sangs rgyas seng ge'i blo gros la// spar gang gi ni rin po ches kyang gtor // bcom ldan 'das kyis legs gsungs ting 'dzin 'di// sems can thams cad la ni/
66a4: phan par shog/ khyod la skyabs su de ri mchi'o zhes// de snyam bsams nas tshig tu'ang brjod par gyur// rgyal po de ni de'i las kyis ni// shi nas de nyid du ni yang skyes te// des ni dge slong rin chen zhes bya bar// phyogs su grags
66a5: pa mthu chen mthong bar gyur/ / de las de nyid kyang ni thos gyur te// thos nas dga' ba shin du rgyas paskyed// bskyed nas byang chub zhugs pa dga' gyur te// gser dang gos kyis dge slong dag pa byas nas// de ni ting 'dzin 'di yang 'dod
66a6: pa'i phyir/ / srog chags stong dang lhan cig rab tu byung // lo ni stong phrag brgya snyed tshang bar yang / de dag kun gyi dge slong de phyir 'brangs// thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i ting 'dzin 'di// lan gnyis ma yin lan cig kho na thos// de'i dran
66a7: pa skyob ma skyes shing / / ting 'dzin zhib 'di ni yongs su tshol// de dag kun gyis las 'di byas pa'i phyir// stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad tshang pa yi// sangs rgyas mthu chen rnams ni mnyes par byas// de las ting 'dzin 'di ni thas
66a8: par gyur/ / de nas bde bar gshegs pa gzhan dag kyang / stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad tshang bar brjod// de bar gshegs pa seng ge'i blo gros la// bdag ni rjes su yi rang bgyid ces brjod// bsod nams byas pa de yis rgyal

66b1: po de/ / brtson 'grus brtan zhes bya'i sangs rgyas gyur// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig bsam mi khyab// thams cad de yis skye zhing 'chi las bkrol// stong du tshang babang rjes su slob slob nas// sangs rgyas 'gyur te dpa' brtan zhes byabs/
66b2: lhang bcas 'jig rten la ni grags par gyur// ting 'dzin smras kyang byang chub reg gyur na// srid pa thams cad la ni mi brten par // gang zhig ting 'dzin 'di ni rgya che bar// ston pa de dag byang chub 'gyur bar ni// smos ci dgos te nam/
66b3: yang the tsom med// sangs rgyas kyis gsungs ted 'dzin zhi ba 'di// dpag tshad brgyan gal te yod gyur kyang // byang chub don du gnyer ba nyin mtshan du// nam yang mi 'dug song ste mnyan par bya// gal te song nas 'di ni ma rnyed
66b4: na/ / 'on kyang de'i bsod nams tshad med de// de ni de'i byang chub bskyed yin na// gang gis song ste 'di thos spos mi dgos// de phyir gang zhig ting 'dzin 'di 'dod pas// dang por tshangs pas byin de dran par byos// dge slong
66b5: gdal ting 'dzin 'di yod la/ / skyo ba'i sems ni med par bsten par bya// rjes su dran ste skye ba snga ma la// stong phrag sum bcu rtsa drug lo tshang bar// ngas ni chos smra ba la rtag brten kyang // ting 'dzin 'di ni nam yang thos mgyur// sngon
66b6: gyi sangs rgyas bden zhes bya ba byung / / de na dge slong gzhon nu thos mang zhing // bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa nub 'og tu// de tshe des ni ting 'dzin 'di nyid bzung // nga ni den rgyal rigs rgyal ba ste// dge slong che ge mo zhig ting 'dzin 'di//
66b7: 'dzin gyi drung du legs par nyon cig ces/ rmi la mad ni ting 'dzin 'di thos nas// myur du langs te rings pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong de btsal te// mthong nas rab tu byung ba de las ni// 'di nyid lan 'ga' thos lta srid
66b8: dam zhes/ / stong phrag drug bcu rtsa drug le tsheng bar// ngas ni dge slong de la dga' bas bkur// bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa'i phyir// lan 'ga' tsam yang thos par ma gyur te/ de phyir dge slong rnams dang dge slong

67a1: ma dge bsnyen dag dang dge bsnyen ma rnams la/ / ting 'dzin thos nas myur du zung shig ces// smos par byed cing khong du chud par byed// der ni bskal pa tshang bar 'dug nas kyang // ting 'dzin 'dzin pa de ni bsnyen cing bsten//
67a2: bskal pa stong du legs par bsnyen bkur byas// des ni ting 'dzin 'di'ang bshad par gyur// ting 'dzin rdul med 'di la rab spyod pa'i// dge slong grong du slong ba de nyid la// bza' ba dang ni bca' dang mal cha dang // de bzhin gos kyang bye ba
67a3: byin par 'gyur/ / bca' dang bza' dang mal stan de bzhin gos// mang po bya ba thams cad lta'ang zhog/ gal te rang gi sha byin thob na ni// legs spyad yin na zas skom smos ci dgos// rtag du bran gyur bsnyen bkur byed cing ni//
67a4: ting 'di na zhi ba 'di'ang tshol byed la// mkhas pas brnyed nas de'ang myur byed kyang // de la byas pa gzo ba ma yin no// bskal pa mang po bye bar btsal kyang ni// ting 'dzin 'di ni shin du rnyed par dka'// 'di yi sgra yang brgyal ma thos gyur//
67a5: na/ kha ton byas nas ston pa smos ci dgos// gang gis gang ga'i bye snyed 'jig rten khams// rin po ches ni bkang ste byin pa pas// gang zhig 'di las tshigs bcad 'ga' lung mnos// de yi bsod nams tshad gzung mi sla'o// bskal pa bye
67a6: ba gang ga'i bye snyed du/ / gang rtag brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa bas// gang zhig 'di las tshig bcad 'ga' lung mnos// de yi bsod nams tshad gzung mi sla'o// bskal pa bye ba gang ga'i bye snyed du/ gang rtag mi rten bsam gtan
67a7: skom pa bas/ / gang zhig 'di las tshigs bcad 'ga' lung mnos// de yi bsod nams tshad gzung mi sla'o// bskal pa bye ba gang ga'i bye snyed du// gang rtag shes rab gnas par gyur pa bas// gang zhig 'di las tshigs cad 'ga'
67a8: lung mnos/ / de'i bsod nams tshad gzung mi sla'o// bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // bzang skyong de bas na dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos ting nge 'dzin 'di gus par

67b1: byas te mnyan par bya'o/ / thos nas kyang gzung bar bya// kun chub par bya/ yi ger bri bar bya/ bcang bar bya// klag par bya'o// bzung zhing kun chub par byas nas kyang gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par sbags par bya'o// legs par bris
67b2: gzhag par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzang skyong ngadu 'das pa'i 'og tu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dad pa can dang pa brtag pa mang ba/ mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir mang
67b3: thos pa tshol bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag mang du thos pa tshol bas dam pa'i phyir phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu rgyu bar 'gyur te/ bzang skyong sems can de lta bu chos don du gnyer ba/ chos la mos pa/ chos 'dod pa/ chos yongs su
67b4: 'dzin pa/ shin du rgyas pa 'dzin pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang ched du ting nge 'dzin 'di lung mnos shing bstan la// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ glegs bam chen por legs par
67b5: bris nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag rgyas btab la gzhag par bya'o/ / bzang skyong de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad byed pa med pa/ bya ba med pa mngon par 'dus ma byas pa/
67b6: chags pa med pa/ dmigs su med pa/ stong pa nyid mtshan ma med pa/ smon pa med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ gnyis su med pa/ 'jug pa med pa/ brten pa med pa/ bgrang du med pa/ rnam par gzhal tu med pa/ bzung du med pa/ dor ba med pa/ kan
67b7: pa med pa/ chos thams cad rtag pa med pa/ chad pa med pa/ rgyu zad pa/ sdug bsngal zad pa/ dngos po zad pa/ mi skye ba/ mi 'gag pa/ mi gnas pa/ mi 'jig pa/ la ma med pa/ lam gyi 'bras bu med pa/ 'phags pa thams cad kyis ma
67b8: dkrugs pa/ byis pa thams cad kyis spangs pa/ mi shes pa rnams kyis bar ga mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba ste/ bzang skyong 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag rgya gang gis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa

68a1: rnams la btab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / bzang skyong de bas na byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus der ting nge 'dzin 'di lung mno par 'dod pas/
68a2: lung mnos shing kha ton du byas nas gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bsngags par bya'o// bzang skyong de la chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' than ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan pa'i phyir yang brtson par
68a3: 'gyur na lung mnod pa dang kha don bya ba'i phyir lta smos kyang ci dgos/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyangs pa dang / sngon smon lam btab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mos pa dang / ji ltar na de bzhin
68a4: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'di 'chang bar 'gyur/ ston par 'gyur snyam nas/
68a5: chos kyi tshul thams cad len pa ste/ bzang skyong chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan pa dang / bzung ba dang / bcad pa'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro// bzang skyong gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na
68a6: byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal ba la tha na yi ger bri ba tsam gyi phyir yang brtson par 'gyur ro/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dang / phyi phyir zhing chos rjes su dran pa la mkhas pa dang / chos thams
68a7: cad rigs pa yongs su gcod pa yid la byed pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa ste/ bzang skyong chos de bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal ba la tha na bri ba tsam gyi phyir yang
68a8: brtson par 'gyur ro/ / bzang skyong de la chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di brtsal ba la brtson par rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i dngos po yongs su gcod pa'i

68b1: shes pas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par rig par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi sku dmigs pa rnam par sgom pa la mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par rig par bya'o// dmigs pa
68b2: thams cad du sangs rgyas dmigs pa yid la byed pas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par rig par bya'o/ / chos thams cad dngos po dang bral bar mos pa la mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la
68b3: brtson par rig par bya'o/ / bzang skyong chos de bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di bcal ba la mngon par brtson par rig par bya'o// bzang skyong phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos kun du 'jukhrug pas
68b4: tshe sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang la la zhig ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal ba la brtson par gyur cing / de 'di snyam du ting nge 'dzin 'di ji ltar na shin du rgyas pa dang / rgya che ba dang /
68b5: yun ring du gnas par 'gyur snyam du sems bskyed par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu de'i bsod nams mang du bskyed de/ bsod nams kyi phung po de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gzhol bar rig par bya ba ma gtogs par bsod nams kyi phung po de'i
68b6: mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ / de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po de smon lam gyi dbang gis myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gzhol bar 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa/ bdag med par gnas pa las nges par
68b7: byung ba/ / gang dag gis bskal pa tshad med grangs med gzhal du med bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'am/ de bas kyang lhag par go cha chen po bgos pa rnams ni ma gtogs te/ de dag thams cad ni bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad yongs su
68b8: rdzogs par 'gyur/ de dag thams cad ni sprod pa'i khyad par ji lta ba dang / tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du nges par 'byung ngo // bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo chos thams cad kyi pha

69a1: rol tu phyin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa thob par 'dod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa thob par 'dod pas phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba dam pa'i chos rnam
69a2: par 'jig pa'i dus der ting nge 'dzin 'di yi ger bri ba dang / lung mnod pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bsgrags par bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad kyi rnam pa
69a3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ni bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di'i nang du 'dus so/ / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la mkhas pa bsgrub pas chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa/
69a4: ste/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dmigs pa thams cad sangs rgyas la dmigs par mos so// dmigs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthar 'jug par byed do// dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad rang bzhin gyis/
69a5: ya ma brlar shes so// de dag ji lta ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dmigs par byed pa dang / yid la byed pa de lta de ltar de dag de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dag pa ste/ de lta bu la gnas pa de dag ni phyogs gang du yang de
69a6: bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mi 'gyur ba med de/ de dag ni phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dag nas tshogs chung ngus 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du
69a7: dmigs pa byas na 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / tshad med pas de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong ba yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa rnams
69a8: de'i mig lam du snang bar 'gyur ro/ / dmigs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni gzung ba med pa'i phyir dmigs pa gcig gis dmigs pa thams cad 'dzin pa yang ma yin/ dmigs pa thams cad kyis dmigs pa gcig 'don pa pa ma//

69b1: no// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nye bar brtags na shin du nye bar zhi ba'i phyir dngos po med pa nyid du grub pa'o// bzang skyong de lta bu la gnas pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur la/ rnam par/
69b2: dag nas rlom sems su mi byed// spros par mi byed de/ de dag ni da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs
69b3: pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pas gang dag gsungs pa ni// ji lta bzhin du ye shes 'jug pa yin// de ni 'jig rten gtso bo ston pa'i sras/
69b4: ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni yid kyang brtson// gang gis sangs rgyas dmigs pa rjes dran pa// dmigs pa'i don ni du ma mthong bar gyur// de la ting 'dzin zhi ba lta dka' 'di// phyi ma'i dus na mngon sum du'ang 'gyur// mkhas pa gang zhig chos
69b5: kun mi rten cing / / sems can dag la phan phyir yid brtson pa// de dag phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po'i tshe// ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni sbyor bar 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan zhing gzung ba'i phyir// gang zhig rtag tu blta dka' chos
69b6: 'di la/ / dran pa brtan par 'jog cing brtson byed pa// de'i lag tu ting 'dzin 'di 'gro 'gyur// gang zhig dran dang blo gros rtogs pa dag/ sangs rgyas dmigs par rtag tu 'jog byed cing // gzhan dring mi 'jog rnal 'byor brtson
69b7: pa de/ ting 'dzin chen po 'di la gnas par 'gyur// rjes su gzud phyir blta dka' tshig la gnas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni yid skyo zhing // mkhas pa srid pa thams cad mi 'dod pa// de dag ting 'dzin chen po 'di la bcon// /
69b8: byang chub 'dod cing phan phyir snying brtse gang // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku la rtog/ zhi ba'i chos la smon lam 'debs byed pa// de dag ting 'dzin 'di la brtan par brtson// 'thab pa med cing rtsod pa med la zhi// bde bar

70a1: gshegs pas bstod pa'i chos tshol zhing / / sangs rgyas dmigs pa la ni rtag gnas pa// de dag ting 'dzin 'di la brtag brtson yin// gang dag phyi ma'i sdig pa'i dus de na// ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni brtson byed pa/
70a2: spyod pa'i yon tan mtha' yas la gnas pa// de yi yon tan 'jig rten mgon pos mkhyen// gang dag zag pa med pa'i chos shes shing // shin du tshul bzhin zag pa rnams kyang shes// rtog pa med spyod mnyam pa nyid gnas pa//
70a3: de dag ting 'dzin 'di la brtag brtson yin// gang dag bde gshegs chos ni tshad med la// shes bzhin du yang kun smon lam 'debs shing / kun mkhyen ye shes la ni brtan gnas pa// de la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ston to// mtshan nyid med cing /
70a4: mtshan nyid las kyang 'das// don mongs pa dang rnam dag gang yang med/ rang bzhin stong pa'i chos rnams gang shes pa// de dag bde bar gshegs pa tshad med mthong // gang zhig dmigs pa mtha' med brtson byed kyang // dmigs/
70a5: pa thams cad stong pa nyid du shes// blta bar dka' dag mthong nas rlom sems med// des ni bde bar gshegs pa tshad med mthong // gang zhig don mthong yid kyang rnam par dag/ nyon mongs med cing zhi ba'i go 'phang gnas// rdul dang bral//
70a6: zhing mnyam don chos ston pa// de la ting 'dzin zhi ba'ang bshad do// bde gshegs sras po zug rngu phyung ba gang // bden pa nyams pa the tsom rnams dang bral// srog chags phan phyir byams pa bsgom byed pa// de dag la ni don mchog 'di
70a7: bshad do/ / gang zhig rang bzhin gyis ni ma rig bral// rig pas ma rig gnas ni sel byed cing // don mchog 'di la brtson par sbyor byed pa// de la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad do// rnam dag gnas shing kun nas nyon mongs med// ye
70a8: shes mtha' yas mngon par 'dod byed cing / / des don 'di la mchog tu dga' thob pa// de la rnam thar zhi pa 'di bshad do// gang zhig kun tu sbyor ba kun las grol// brtan zhing srog chags kun la snying brtse zhing // gnod sems med ci

70b1: zhi lam dga' brten pa/ / de la ting 'dzin 'di ni yang dag bsgrags// bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // bzang skyong chos 'di bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par/
70b2: 'gyur ba'o// zhi gang zhe na 'das ste/ sangs rgyas la gus pa dang // mi byed pa dad pa yid la byed pa dang // chas la gus pa nyan 'dod pa dang / chos kyi rjes sa 'thun pa'i tshig bsgrub pa ste// bzang spyod ches bzhi po 'di dag byang
70b3: chub sems dpa' rnams ting nga 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ba'o/ / bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di thab par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi'o// bzhig bzhin 'ad lta ste/ yid la byed ci log sa pas
70b4: sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems dpa' dang / chos la the tsom med pas dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid rang bzhin gyis dge ba la rtog pa dang / dngos po la mkhas pa la rtog pas ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa/ shin du stong
70b5: pa'i chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba dang / 'du shes rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa// yongs su gcod pa shes pa la rtog pas dngos po ya ma brla rnam par 'jig pa ste/ bzang skyong chos de bzhi ni byang chub sems
70b6: dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur ba'o/ / bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su
70b7: bzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa la mkhas la dam pa'i chos bsrung zhing skyed pa dang / sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyor zhing sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang / sems can gyi 'du shes rnam par
70b8: 'jig pa la mkhas pa ste/ bzang skyong chos de bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ba'o// bzad skyong de bas na phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha mal dam pa'i chos cher 'khrug pa'i tshe/ der

71a1: byang chub sems dpa' sa lus dang srog kyang yongs su btang ba la gnas te/ ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// bzang skyong chos thams cad gzung ba la mkhas pa la rtson pa'i byang chub
71a2: sems dpa' rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos rin po che'i mdzod 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'jog par 'gyur/ / chos 'di lta bu 'di yang dag
71a3: par bstan pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / yang dag par bsgrags par bya ba yang nus par 'gyur ro// zang skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnams pa brtson 'grus kyis gnas 'di dag ni yod de// byang chub sems dpa' rnams brtson 'grus
71a4: kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / bzang skyong gang zhig phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus der chos 'di dag 'jog par byed// yang dag par 'dzin
71a5: par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/ de dag ni de bzhin
71a6: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na 'dug kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
71a7: bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ / de ni chos 'dod pa dang / chos don tu gnyer ba dang / chos bsgrub pa'i phyir phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na ting nge 'dzin 'di'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro// gang dag phyi ma 'tsha phyi ma'i dus na
71a8: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i nor rnams kyis yang dag par bzung bar 'gyur ro// gang dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na chos 'di lta

71b1: bu 'di dag yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang myur du
71b2: 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang zhig brtan pa chos sems pa// phyi ma'i dus su gyur pa na// dam chos gzung phyir gnas gyur pa// de dag la na gzungs
71b3: 'di bshad/ / gang dag dam chos rin chen phyir// 'jigs pa med pa brtson byed cing // snying yang brtsel snying rje can// de dag chos kyang 'dzin par gnas// brtan zhing bag yod dga' ba dang // thub pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa// dedag/
71b4: don du ting nge 'dzin// sangs rgyas bsngags pa bsngags pa yin// gang zhig chos rgyal skyob pa yis// gang dag byin gyis brlabs gyur pa// de dag phyi dus 'jigs bcas tshe// chos nyid 'di ni 'dzin par 'gyur// shin du ngo bo nyid
71b5: kyis na/ chos rnams stong zhing spros med par// dran dang ldan pa gang gis shes// de dag chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur// thams cad ches kyang ngo bo nyid// de la bsam yas tshigs su bcad// nges pa nyid du shes gyur pa// de dag chos
71b6: kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ / zad pa shes la gnas gyur cing // mi skye ba 'a'ang rab gnas la// sems ni dul zhing ngo tsha ldan// de dag chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur// bde ba'i lam ni bla na med// cang shes lam la zhugs gyur pa/
71b7: brtson 'grus byin gyi brlabs dang ldan// de dag chos 'dzin gnas pa yin// de bzhin nyid dang mi rtog don// gang gis chos nyid rab tu shes// de la spros pa ci yang med// de dag chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur// thams cad ches nim/
71b8: med par// nges pa gang gis shes pa de// ci yang med cing len med pa'i// chos nyid de ni sgrogs par 'gyur// 'dzin pa med cing 'dzin dang bral// chos kun sngon nas yongs dag par// gang gis shes pa de dag ni// chos kyi spyod

72a1: yul gnas pa yin/ / chos kun ngo bo med pa ri na// de ltar chos la gang gis shes// de dag chos nyid 'di ston 'gyur// de ni 'jug pa yin par bshad// ming med ming dang bral gyur cing // spros pa med cing mi skye bar// gang gis chos
72a2: nyid rab shes pa/ / de dag stong pa nyid kyang sgrogs// gnas pa med cing 'gro ba med// nam mkha'i gnas bzhin dag par ni// gang gis chos 'di shes gyur pa// de la ting 'dzin skye bar 'gyur// gang dag 'du shes don rtog bral// ngo bo nyid du ma
72a3: skyes shing / dngos po'i 'du shes bral gyur pa/ de dag chos nyid ston par 'gyur// rgyas gad ba de ni rgyu med de// dgongs pa'i tshig tu gsungs pa yin// gang gis de ltar shes gyur pa// de dag chos nyid 'di 'dzin 'gyur// bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i/
72a4: ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // bzang skyong de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bag yod pa lhur blangs te// chos 'di dag yang dag par bsdu bar bya'o// 'di 'phan yon la sbyar bar bya'o// tshul bzhin dang yang
72a5: ldan par bya'o/ / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yang yongs su spang bar bya ste/ de ltar chos zab mo blta bar dka' ba// rtogs par dka' ba/ gang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed par byed pa/ rang 'byung rnams kyi ye shes dang thogs pa med pa'i
72a6: ye shes thob par byed pa 'di rnyed mi dka' bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang // tshe dang ldan pa 'od bsrungs chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / li tsa byi
72a7: gzhon nu rin chen 'byung gnas dang / khyim bdag ded dpon che bzangs dang / tshong dpon gyi bu phug sras dang / bram ze 'dam bus byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang pos byin dang / khyim bdag chu lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga
72a8: brgya tsam po de dag dang / 'khor bzhi po las ji snyed cig 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa 'jig rten rnams la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu rnams ngas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya

72b1: stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa bla na med pa'i chos rin po che 'di'i mdzod dang / 'jig rten thams cad yid ches par mi 'gyur ba zab mo// don zab pa/ rnam par thar pa sgo gsum gyi tshul bshad pa/ zab mo byed pa/ mthong ba dad/
72b2: ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ mkhas shing shes pa/ rig pa/ rgya che ba/ gya nom pa/ don phun sum tshogs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di yang khyed la gtad do// rjes su gtad do// gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
72b3: brten du gyur pa de dag kyang khyed la nyis gyur du rjes su gtad kyis/ khyed kyis kyang ci nas kyang bri bar bya'o// mnyan par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// shin du rgyas pa dang / rgya cher bya/
72b4: ba'i phyir gzhan ngag la yang rgya cher bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// yang dag par bsgrags par bya'o// sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir bsgom pa'i sbyor ba la brtson par bya'o// ji skad bstan pa bzhin du chos kyi
72b5: rjes su 'thun pa'i chos bsgrub par bya ste/ de ci nas kyang skyes bu tha ma bar ma gyur par bya'o// bzang skyong rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig ting nge 'dzin 'ad thos la thos nas kyang lung nod par byed/ kha ton du byed/
72b6: kun chub par byed na des lhag pa'i bsam pas gus par bya ste mnyan par bya'o// lung mnod par bya'o// bshad par bya'o// gang dag gzhan dag la ston tam/ klog tu 'jug na des kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas rgya cher bya ba'i phyir
72b7: ci nas kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di yun ring du gnas pa dang / shin du rgyas pa dang / shin du rgya cher gzhan dag la bstan par bya/ klog tu gzhug par bya ste/ 'di ni khyed la rjes su bstan pa yin no// chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bshad pa'i
72b8: tshe sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa nas 'dus pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis

73a1: ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid thob ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// lha rnams
73a2: kyis kyang bar snang las/ tog gi char phab po// rnga 'o cha dag kyang ma brdungs par sgra byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang dge slong dang/
73a3: dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa da ltar gyi sangs rgyas man
73a4: sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo chu ba ban de rang na rak+Shi tas zhus te gtan la bab pa/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos
73a5: lags/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba bu N+ya sa mud ts+tsha ya sa mA d+hi nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang
73a6: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gi cag na/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa na a mras bsrungs pa'i tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na/ dge slong khri'i
73a7: dge slong gi dag 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba/ bcad shes pa/ glang po chen po/
73a8: bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bo gang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ga sems can thams cad kyi dbang gis dam pa'i pha rol tu son

73b1: pa sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri thams cad kyang phyir me ldog pa bzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa// mngon par shes pa thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pa la mkhas pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang
73b2: brtan pa dang / shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i dam pa'i pha rol du son pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i blo zas
73b3: dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bla ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad par blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'brel ba'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
73b4: dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshes kyi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
73b5: dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang / lha'i bu bzhi khri thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa
73b6: dang / 'jig rten skyong ba mang po dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa shin du snying po
73b7: gyur te/ mu stegs byed kyi phyogs thams cad zil gyis mnan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzang nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs
73b8: te/ bcom ldan 'das gal bde logs sum mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di shin du snying por gyur ste/ mu stegs can ngan pa spyod pa can dang / kun du

74a1: rgyu grangs ma mchis pa dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ mdzes par gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams legs par yongs su gzung du
74a2: gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags su gsol// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bskyang du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i
74a3: rtsa ba bskyed par gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa dang / yang dag par bstan par gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs
74a4: rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su gzung du gsol/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtad par gsol// ji lta bu'i tshul gyi chos kyi phan gdags pas mya ngan las 'das par 'chi ba'i lam bstan par gsol/
74a5: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /
74a6: sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / mi 'bral ba dang / bskrad ngas pa ma mchis pa'i chos can gyi slad du dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi dgongs pa rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad
74a7: du blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / don rtogs pa rjes su 'thob pa'i slad du rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rang gi sems yongs su dag pa'i slad du ngo tsha dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa'i las thams cad spong ba'i slad du brel
74a8: yod pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / cho ga dang spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i slad du brtan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba'i slad du dpa' bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor thams cad kyi nang du /

74b1: tsha ba dang bral ba'i slad du sran thub par 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsod nams yongs su mi nyams pa dang / chos yongs su mi nyams pa dang / shes
74b2: rab yongs su mi nyams pa dang ye shes yongs su mi nyams par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar na lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi nyams pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug gi bar du sems can
74b3: thams cad la mdza' ba brtan pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du gnas pas sems can rnams la me slu ba dang / gtong ba thams cad rjes su 'jug pas ma
74b4: bstan pa'i srin pa dang ldan pa dang / sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa la gnas pas ma bstan pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / gnod sems med pa'i yid kyis sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas ma bstan pa'i bzod pa
74b5: dang ldan pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba'i yid kyis don thams cad yongs su bsgrub pas ma bstan pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin la mkhas te/ bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams
74b6: cad la mi gnas pas ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan dang ldan pa dang / lta ba thams cad dang bral zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob pas ma bstan pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa dang / sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhes
74b7: bsdu ba la shin du brtson pas bsdu ba shin du bsdus pa dang / lha dang mi'i skye ba thams cad la mi rtag par yid la bgyid pa la brtson pas re ba ma mchis pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la legs par gnas shing nyan
74b8: thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'dod pa dang bral bas sgo'i them pa'i rten lta bu dang / chos kyi dbang du bgyid kyi 'dod pa'i dbang du mi bgyid pa dang / chos kyi rgyal srid don du gnyer bar bgyid kyi lha dang mi'i rgyal srid don du miganyer ba dang /

75a1: sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar 'gyur ba dang / chos kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur gyi zang zing gis mi 'tshe ba dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams
75a2: cad la zhe 'gras pa ma mchis pa'i sems dang ldan pas zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad la gti mug gi mun pa dang bral bas gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bas bdud thams cad
75a3: las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang / sgo thams cad nas yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas thabs la mkhas par 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
75a4: stong gsum gyi bdag po sred med kyi bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sred med kyi bu khyod legs so legs so// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni sred med kyi bu khyod
75a5: legs so/ / sred med kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang // gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba ngas bshad do// bcom
75a6: ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
75a7: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de la rten na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsod nams yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur// chos yongs su
75a8: nyams par mi 'gyur/ / shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur// ye shes yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/ bsdu ba'i dngos

75b1: po bzhi la brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa nas/ sgo thams cad nas yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas/ thabs mkhas par 'gyur ba'i bar de dag dang / yon tan gyi khyad par gzhan dag da
75b2: ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming tsam bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba tshan po che chen po stobs
75b3: chen po dang ldan pa zhig yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na gnas so/ / de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni tshan po che chen po stobs po che'i shugs dang ldan pa ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i sems can la 'di lta ste/ stobs sam sprob
75b4: bdag dang mnyam pa yang med na/ lhag pa lta ga la yod snyam mo// des dge sbyong go'u ta ma stobs po che'i shugs dang ldan te/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan zhing sred med kyi bri'i lus thob pa zhes grag go snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/
75b5: bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i thad du song la// bcom ldan 'das de ci 'dra ba dang / bdag ci 'dra ba sad par bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ a mras bsrungs
75b6: pa'i tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ sangs
75b7: rgyas kyi mthu chen pos chos ston cing / ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'phags pa dang 'dra la kun nas mdzes shing blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ma thag tu dga' ba ba yang
75b8: mchog tu dga' ba chen po thob bo/ / de dga' ba dang dad pa dang mchog tu dga' ba chen po thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'tha' shig

76a1: la phyag 'tshal zhing mgo bor thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la rtog cing 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ nga rgyal dang
76a2: rgyags pa dang / dregs pa gdul ba'i phyir gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa// maud gal gyi bu khyod song la// nga byang chub sems dpa' gyur pa na shAkya'i bu mos 'tsha ma'i phyir mda' 'phangs pa gang yin pa de 'dir
76a3: long shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas mda' deg la mchis pa bdag gis ma mthong lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
76a4: kyis de'i tshe phyag g.yas pa nas snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer cig btang ste/ 'od zer des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i khor yug chen po gang
76a5: yin pa de na mda' de 'dug pa snang bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i khor yug chen po na mda' 'dug pa de khyod kyis mthong
76a6: ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// maud gal gyi bu khyod sod la mda' de long shig/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas// tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen
76a7: pos bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar mnyan te/ 'khor thams cad kyi nang nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brgyad pa 'am/ brgyad pa las bskam pa bzhin du skad cig thang cig yud
76a8: tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khor yug chen po de nas mda' de blangs te bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci gnas mda' 'di byang chub sems dpas

76b1: yab yum las byung ba'i stobs kyis 'phangs pa lags sam/ / 'on te rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'phangs pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu yab yum las byung ba'i stobs kyis mda' 'phangs pa yin gyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
76b2: kyis 'phangs pa ni ma yin no/ / maud gal gyi bu gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'phangs su zin na 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems/
76b3: dpa' chen po'i yab yum las byung ba'i stobs/ rang gi stobs bsod nams yongs su smin pa las skyes pa de ji lta bu zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu mi bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang gcig gi
76b4: stobs so/ / glang bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang sngon po gcig gi stobs so// glang sngon po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che tha mal ba gcig gi stobs so// glang po che tha mal pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che
76b5: 'jigs su rung ba gcig gi stobs so/ / glang po che 'jigs su rung ba bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che glang po che mo 'dra ba gcig gi stobs so// glang po che glang po che mo 'dra ba bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni dgon pa'i glang po che
76b6: gcig gi stobs so/ / dgon pa'i glang po che bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni ri'i shigs byed kyi glang po che gcig gi stobs so// ri 'bigs byed kyi glang po che bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che mtshon cha'i sder mo can gcig gi stobs so//
76b7: glang po che mtshan cha'i sder mo can bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che gshol mda' 'dzin gcig gi stobs so// glang po che gshol mda' 'dzin bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che stang zil mdog gcig gi stobs so// glang
76b8: po che stang zil mdog bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che gel pa gcig gi stobs so/ / glang po che gel pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che sngon po gcig gi stobs so// glang po che sngon po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang

77a1: po che ser po gcig gi stobs so/ / glang po che ser po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che dmar po gcig gi stobs so// glang po che dmar po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che skya bo gcig gi stobs so// glang po che
77a2: skya bo bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che ku mu gcig gi stobs so/ / glang po che ku mu da bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che pad ma dkar po gcig gi stobs so// glang po che pad ma dkar po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni glang po che
77a3: pad ma gcig gi stobs so/ / glang po che pad ma bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni spos kyi glang po che gcig gi stobs so// spos kyi glang po che bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni spos kyi glang po che chen po gcig gi stobs so// spos kyi glang po che chen po kyis
77a4: stobs gang yin pa de ni seng ge ral pa can thabs can gcig gi stobs so/ / seng ge ral pa can thabs can bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni tshan po che gcig gi stobs so// tshan po che bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni tshan po che chen po gcig
77a5: gi stobs so/ / chen po che chen po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni stobs mchog gcig gi stobs so// stobs mchog bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni stobs mchog chen po gcig gi stobs so// stobs mchog chen po bcu'i stobs gang yin
77a6: par ni rab gnon gcig gi stobs so/ / rab gnon bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni rab gnon chen po gcig gi stobs so// rab gnon chen po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni buM 'i bu gcig gi stobs so// sah+la'i lha'i bu bcu'i stongs
77a7: gang yin pa de ni gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so/ / gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha'i bu bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni lha'i bu gshol mda' 'dzin gcig gi stobs so// lha'i bug shol mnga' 'dzin
77a8: bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni lha'i bu lag na phreng thogs gcig gi stobs so/ / lha'i bu lag na phrang thogs gcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni lha'i bu rtag tu myos gcig gi stobs so// lha'i bu rtag tu myos bcu'i stobs gang

77b1: yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni lus ngan gcig gi stobs so// lus ngan bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni sum bcu rtsagasam
77b2: pa'i lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so/ / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gcig gi stobs so// lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni 'thab bral gyi lha
77b3: gcig gi skyabs so/ / 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni lha'i bu rab 'thab brul gcig gi skyabs so// lha'i bu rab 'thab bral bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu gcig gi stobs sa
77b4: dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan gcig gi stobs so/ / lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so//
77b5: 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul gcig gi stobs so// lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so// gzhan 'bral
77b6: dbang byed kyi lha'i bu thams cad kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni lha'i rgyal po dbang byed gcig gi stobs so/ / lha'i rgyal po dbang byed bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu gcig gi stobs so// bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad
77b7: kyi stobs gang yin pa de ni 'dud sdig can gcig gi stobs so/ / bdud sdig can bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni sred med kyi bu phyed pa gcig gi stobs so// sred med kyi bu phyed pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni sred med kyi bu gcig gi
77b8: stobs so/ / sred med kyi bu bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni sred med kyi bu chen po gcig gi stobs so// sred med kyi bu chen po bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa brgya lon pa gcig gi stobs

78a1: so/ / byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa brgya lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa stong lon pa gcig gi stobs so// byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal/
78a2: pa stong lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa khri lon pa gcig gi stobs so// byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskalnga khri lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub
78a3: sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa 'bum lon pa gcig gi stobs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa 'bum lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa
78a4: sa ya lon pa gcig gi stobs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa sa ya lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba lon pa gcig gi stobs so// byang chub
78a5: sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag bcu lon pa gcig gi stobs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal
78a6: dbye ba phrag bcu lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya lon pa gcig gi stobs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya lon pa
78a7: bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag stong lon pa gcig gi stobs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag stong lon pa bcu'i stobs gang
78a8: yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag khri lon pa gcig gi stobs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag khri lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub

78b1: sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum lon pa gcig gi stobaso/ / byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas/
78b2: bskal pa bye ba phrag sa ya lon pa gcig gi stobs so// byang chub sems dpa' nges par byung nas bskal pa bye ba phrag sa ya lon pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa gcig gi stobs
78b3: so/ / byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa srid pa tha ma pa gcig gi stobs yin te/ maud gal gyi bu stobs de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
78b4: sems dpa' chen po btsas ma thag tu sa la gom pa bdun 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / maud gal gyi bu gal te 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' ga la 'dug pa'i 'jig
78b5: rten gyi khams de rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis ma brlabs su zin na/ btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor ba'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sa chen po thur du dpag tshad drug khri brgyad stong zhom par 'gyur te/ de'i 'og nas chu'i phung po las
78b6: chu'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam sa gzhi chen po brtol te 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa chen po de yang zhom par mi 'gyur la/ sems can rnams la yang gnod par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems
78b7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred pa tha ma pa btsas ma thag pa'i stobs dang / myur ba dang / shugs dang / mthu ni de 'dra'o// maud gal gyi bu byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ba tsas ma thag du bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
78b8: dpa' lang tsho'i mchog la bab pa gcig gi stobs yin te/ stobs de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi snying por 'gro'o// ji lta bu'i stobs

79a1: dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba de bas 'bum gyur gyis lhag pa'i stobs kyis ni byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug go/ / de bas kyang ches grangs med dpag tu med brjod du
79a2: med bsam kyis mi khyab pa'i stobs dang ldan pas ni blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / maud gal gyi bu gal te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad
79a3: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs dang ldan par gyur na yang // de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i mkhyen pa'i stobs gcig gi 'bum gyi char yang mi bor pa nas
79a4: dpe bar du yang mi bzod de/ stobs de lta bu brnyes pas stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa 'di bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// maud gal gyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i stobs 'di ni sngon gyi
79a5: dag pa'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pas bsdus pa ste/ de las chung ba yang med/ lhag pa yang med do// de ni rdzu 'phrul yang ma yin/ cho 'phrul yang ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs ni stobs ga
79a6: d ang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sa rkang pa'i mthe bo'i spu'i khung bu gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed drangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu 'phangs kyang sems can 'ga' tsam la
79a7: yang gnod par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi stobs ni de ltar dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyag mtshungs pa med/ grangs med de// de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi mnyam
79a8: pa dang mnyam mo/ / maud gal gyi bugal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de bstan du zin na ni khyed kyis kyang yid chos par me rus na sems can gzhan gyis lta ci spos/ maud gal gyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi nyid

79b1: bor 'gro ba de'i tshe khams bzhi pos dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gi khams 'di dag khams gcig pu 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i khams su byin gyis rlob ste/ des nas chen po de zhom par mi 'gyur la/ sems can rnams la yang gardod
79b2: par mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa las byang chub sems dpa'i yab yum las byung ba'i stobs 'di thos nas/ dga' zhing spu zing zhes byed la ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bstan las
79b3: langs ste bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ljang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba deng logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
79b4: bcom ldan 'das las byang chub sems dpa'i stobs thos nas bdag gi nga rgyal dang dregs pa chag ste/ ma mchis par gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o//
79b5: sems can thams cad la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu ci 'dra ba de ltar
79b6: yang bdag gis thob par gyur cig/ tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid las lha'i bu khris tshig 'di thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de ltar de
79b7: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig ces smras so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus 'di ska pa gsol to// com ldan da/
79b8: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi ming bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams

80a1: thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba'i slad du bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin de bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis steng gsum gyi bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sred med
80a2: bul bka' bul pa/ sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa des bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yongs su ma bzung ba de ni gang yang
80a3: med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa de'i khengs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir ro// sred med kyi bu dper na chu mig thams cad dang / mtshe bran thams cad dang / mtshe'u thams
80a4: dang / chu klung thams cad dang / chu bran thams cad dang / mtsho thams cad dang / lteng ka thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen po'i khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de bzhin du/ sred med kyi bubasod nams bya ba'i dngos po ci yang rung ba sbyin pa las byung
80a5: ba rnams dang / tshul khrims las byung ba rnams dang / bsgom pa las byung ba rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / zag pa med pa rnams dang / 'jig rten pa rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi
80a6: bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ji snyed pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems kyi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa dag go/ / sred med kyi bu de'i phyir bsod nams thams cad yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa'i
80a7: rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o// sred med kyi bu/ dper na rin po che'i ri chen po gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/ ldan po dang / lhun po chen po dang / btad bzung dang /
80a8: bzung chen po dang / khor yug dang / kher yug chen po dang / gzhan yang ri nag po rnams dang / r+tha dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i khe bra

80b1: dang / 'dzam bu'i gling dang / shar gyi lus 'phags dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gsum rtsa
80b2: 'jig rten gyi khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar ji snyed yod pa nas/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya'i bar 'di dag
80b3: thams cad ni stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs par lta bar bya ba de bzhin du sred med kyi bu so so'i skye bo'i bsod nams rnams dang / slob pa'i bsod nams rnams dang / mi slob pa 'a so
80b4: nams rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams rnams ji yang rung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa'i khongs su 'dus
80b5: shing rjes su zhugs te/ sred med kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag gis bsod nams thams cad yongs su bzung ba de ltar rig par bya'o// sred med
80b6: kyi bu gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can las/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ma gtogs pa ji snyed pa de dag gi nang na 'khor los bsgyur ba ni bsod nams dang shes rab kyis mchog tu brjod do// sred med kyi bu gling bzhi
80b7: pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can re re yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i bsod nams
80b8: dang ldan par gyur na/ sred med kyi bu 'di snyam du sems/ ci bsod nams kyi phung po de mang ngam/ byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgrer ba gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po yang mang lags

81a1: nasems can grangs ma mchis pa de dag gi lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sred med kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa sems can du bsdu
81a2: bar bsdus pa de dag re re nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa lta zhog
81a3: gi/ sred med kyi bu gal te 'jig rten gyi khams gar gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur na/ sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci sems na
81a4: de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po med dam/ byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gcig 'khor los bsgyur ba dang mnyam par gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis na
81a5: sems can grangs ma mchis pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sra med kyi bu khyod mos par bya/ khong du chud par bya ste/ de bas na
81a6: sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi phung po yongs su bzung ba ches mdal ches dpag tu med de/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung pos ni bsod nams kyi phung po de'i brgya'i char yang mi bor// stong gi
81a7: cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi char yang mi phod/ grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang me bzod do// de med kyi bu 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa
81a8: ti nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang po'o/ / sred med kyi bu gzhan yang stong gi bdag po tshangs pa ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas khyab par byed do// srad med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gal te mi la la zhig gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi

81b1: khams rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin na/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po de dang tshangs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dganyis gang mang / byang chub sems dpa' srad med kyi
81b2: bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid ches mang gi sbyin pa las byu ba ni de lta ma lags so// sred med kyi bu stong gi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po lta zhog gi/ sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du
81b3: sems/ stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pas stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas khyab par byed la/ sred med kyi bu gal te mi la la zhig gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang bar byas te sbyin
81b4: pa b+hin na/ sred med kyi bu sbyin pa las byung ba dang / byams pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dganyis gang mar/ byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i byams pa dang ldan
81b5: pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa de nyid ches mang gi sbyin pa las byung ba ni da lta ma lags so/ / sred med kyi bu stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po lta zhog gi/ sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ stong gsum gyi bad/
81b6: po tshangs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas khyad par byed la/ sred med kyi bu mi la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin na sred med kyi
81b7: bu sbyin pa las byung ba dang / tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gnyis gang mar/ byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni tshangs pa chen po'i
81b8: byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phong ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshangs pa chen po'i

82a1: byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po lta zhog gi/ sred med kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa bsgom
82a2: b a dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po bas ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol
82a3: pa la brtson pa/ g.yo med cing sgyu med pa'i byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di nyid de bas ches med ste/ tshangs pa'i bsod nams
82a4: kyi phung po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/ / srad med kyi bu de ltar na sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsod nams kyi
82a5: phung po ni dpag du med pa yin te/ sred med kyi bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag gis bsod nams thams cad
82a6: yongs su bsdus pa de ltar rig par bya ste/ sred med kyi bu 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa gnyis pa'o// sred med kyi bu 'di de nam du sems/ shang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams ji skad cig yod/ lho dang / rab dang thang
82a7: dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams ji skad cig yod/ byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis so// de bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so// phyogs bcu'i 'dzag rten gyi
82a8: khams de dag ni brjod pa 'am brda' spang par rje mi thogs lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sred med kyi bugal te dpen blang pa bstan pas bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du bstan du zin kyang / phyogs bcun 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed yod/

82b1: pa ni bstan par sla ba ma yin no// sred med kyi bu 'on kyang don 'di nyid brda' sprad pa dang / bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can bsod nams 'dod pa rnams phyir zhing 'bogs par bya ba dang /
82b2: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i sems can rnams kyi brtson 'grus chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la dpes bstan to// sred med kyi bu dper na mi la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chu'i phung po
82b3: yan chad srid pa'i rtse mo man chad yungs 'brus yongs su gang bar byas la/ sred med kyi bu de las shar phyogs su yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas yungs 'bru gcig bor te/ de lta bu'i tshul gyis yungs 'bru de dag
82b4: thams cad yongs su zad par byas kyang / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs bcu kun tu yang de bzhin du sbyar ro// sred med kyi bu gal te 'jig rten gyi khams
82b5: gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed yungs 'bru yongs su gar bar gyur la/ de las mi la la zhig gis yungs 'bru re re yang / yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi char gsas na/ sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ yungs 'bru'i chagasas pa de dag bgrang
82b6: ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par nus sam/ byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yungs 'bru gcig gi chagasas pa'i phyogs gang lags pa de yang gling bzhi pa'i sems can thams cad shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar gyur pas kyang
82b7: bskal par yang rtogs par rngo mi thog lags na/ yungs 'bru'i cha gses pa thams cad lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ sred med kyi bu gal te mi la la zhig gis shar phyogs su yungs 'bru'i chagasas pa de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das
82b8: nas yungs 'bru'i chagases pa re re bor te/ sred med kyi ba de lta bu'i tshul gyis yungs 'bru'i tshagases pa thams cad zad par byas kyang / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang ste

83a1: dang / phyogs bcu kun du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro// sred med kyi bu de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkhas yongs su khyab pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mi la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang bar byas te/
83a2: spyir ba byin na/ sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so// com ldan 'das
83a3: kyis bka' stsal pa/ sred med kyi bu de lta bu'i sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsdus pa gang yin pa de ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ g.yo med pa// sgyu med
83a4: pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba las brtson pa'i snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen po bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsdus pa'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu ba'i bar du yang mi bzod do// sred med kyi bu dper na
83a5: gzugs kyi rnam pa nam mkha'i khams kyis ma khyab pa ci yang med pa de bzhin du/ sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa des ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dang 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed yod pa dang / sangs
83a6: rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed yod pa de dag ma khyab pa gang yang med de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas yongs su khyab po// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag sems
83a7: can du bsdu bar bsdus pa de dag thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur tam/ de bzhin du brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur tam/ de bzhin du tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan
83a8: par gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ g.yo med pa/ sgyu med pa/ sems can yongs su dgrol ba la brtson pa/ snying rje chen po la zhugs pa/ byams pa chen po la gnas pa'i gom pa bdun la bsod nams kyi phung po bsdus pa gang

83b1: yin pa de ni de bas ches mang ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de lta ma yin no// sred med kyi bu 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus
83b2: pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa gsum pa'o/ / sred med kyi bu gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang
83b3: ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char mi bod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/ / sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad brtsa
83b4: byin dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad ni tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/ / sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
83b5: k hams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad ni dge bsnyen nag po'i mchog gi bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rmyil
83b6: bar du yang mi bzod do/ / sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge snyen nag po'i mchog dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad ni shA ri'i bri
83b7: shes rab dang / ye shes dang bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do// sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad shA ri'i bu dang mnyam
83b8: pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang / de dag thams cad ni rang sangs rgyas gcig gi shes rab dang / ye shes dang / bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do// sred med kyi

84a1: bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyis shes rab dang / ye shes dang bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'
84a2: sems dpa' chen po nges par byung nas bskal pa lnga brgya lon pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes dang / bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi bod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do// thams cad la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/ sred med kyi bu 'di ni bsod
84a3: nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa bzhi pa'o/ / bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ mi sum khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// stong gsum gyi stang chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams
84a4: 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ / lha dang mi'i sil snyan dag kyang grag go/ lha dang mi'i me tog gi sprin dag kyang bab ste/ me tog gi sprin de dag gis sa chen po 'di pus mo nub tsam du bkram mo// lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zad/
84a5: lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa
84a6: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / bskyed pa dang / bskyed par 'gyur ba gang dag lags pa de dag gis ni bdag cag zil gyis gnon to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sems can de dag gi don bgyid pa legs so//
84a7: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag cag gis 'tshal ba ltar na sems can gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma zhugs pa de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mngon par byung ba yang
84a8: ma lags/ de dag thams cad ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la yang dag par gzhol ba yang ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de

84b1: dag thams cad ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mngon par byung ba yang lags/ de dag thams cad ni bsod napas thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge dzin de la yang dag par gzhol ba yang lags so//
84b2: le'adang po'o// // bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das na chen po dri ma med pa'i gzabarjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa /
84b3: bgyid pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting
84b4: 'di thob par byed pa'i chos gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi gtong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos gcig po 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan
84b5: yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'i chos gnyis te gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mnyan pa'i chos yongs su tshol bas chog mi shes pa dang / ji ltar thob pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa ste/
84b6: rigs kyi bu chos 'di gnyis ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos gsum te/ gsum gang zhon 'di
84b7: lta ste sdig pa thams cad yongs su spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos gsum po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o//
84b8: rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / lta ba yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab yongs su

85a1: dag pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos lngaste/
85a2: lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub la zhugs pa dang / rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smra ba dang / g.yo med pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa ste/ rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag ni bsod na sa
85a3: thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten
85a4: pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong ba dang / tshogs kyi kha mi 'dren pa dang / dben pa'i gnas na gnas pa dang / byams pa chen po mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po dang ldan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos drug po de dag
85a5: ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhi gnas yongs
85a6: su tshol ba dang / lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / rgyu yongs su shes pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / lam gyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba dang / lam bsgom pa la le lo med pa ste/ rigs kyi bu bdun
85a7: po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus po'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lus
85a8: las su rung ba nyid dang / sems las su rung ba nyid dang / tshor ba la so sor rtog pa nyid dang sdig pa 'i dgege tsho skyes pa rnam myed dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyed pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes

85b1: pa rnams skyed pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams kun nas bsrung zhing yongs su sbyong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu tshes brgyad po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams
85b2: thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa mi zad pa'i chos nyid dang / ma 'ongs pa mi zad pa'i chos nyid dang / da ltar byung ba mi zad pa'i chos nyid du ma song rtog par dang sku ma'i
85b3: chos la so sor rtog pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang / chos thams cad la ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa dang / stong pa nyid mi spong ba dang / mtshan ma med pa/ rnam par bsgoms pas smon pa dang bral ba da/
85b4: bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos dgu po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed
85b5: pa'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa la mos pa dang / srog med pa la bzod pa dang / gang zag med pa la gcig tu nges pa dang / mi rtag pa la yid ches pa dang / skye ba thams cad la sems can dmyal bar 'du shes pa dang / phung
85b6: popo rnams la gshed mar 'du shes pa dang / khams rnams la sbrul gdug par 'du shes pa dang / skye mched rnams la grong stong par 'du shes pa dang / srid pa rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la 'dris pa
85b7: 'du shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'od skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol
85b8: to/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi tshogs yang dag par bsdus par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// bsod nams phyogs par 'tshal

86a1: ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bgyi'o/ / bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'thob parar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams
86a2: thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bgyi/ mos par bgyi'o// bsod nams mi zad pa 'thob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bgyi'o// bsod nams rgya mtsho 'thob par
86a3: 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi// klag par bgyi/ bshad par bgyi'o// bsod nams brgya'i mtshan yongs su gzung bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
86a4: chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa brtson par bgyi'o/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdo/
86a5: par brtson pas 'di lta ste/ bsod nams mi zad pa dang / bsod nams rgya mtsho dang / bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / bsod nams stsogs pa dang / bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyi chos 'di dag ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags
86a6: de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu gsum po 'di dag ni bsod nams nye bar rton pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / bsod nams 'dub
86a7: dang / bsod nams rgyas pa dang / bsod nams mi zad pa dang / bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / bsod nams rgya mtsho yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i tshogs dang / tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang / thos pa'i tshogs so// rigs kyi bu
86a8: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i tshogs la ji ltar brtson par bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dngos po gang la de'i gtod pa'i sems mi skye zhing gtong ba'i blo mi 'byung ba'i

86b1: dngos po de blang bar mi bya'o/ / yongs su gzung ba gang la gtong ba'i sems mi skye ba'i yongs su gzung ba de yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o// gang la slong ba rnams kyis bslangs na yongs su 'dzin pa'i blo skyo ba'i g.yog 'khor de gzung bar mi bya'o//
86b2: dngos po gang la slong ba rnams kyis bslangs na byang chub sems dpa'i mi gtong ba'i blo skye bar 'gyur ba'i rgyal srid de blang bar mi bya'o// longs spyod de dag dang / nor de dang / rdzas de dang / rin po che de dag blang bar mi bya ba nas de lta bu'i dngos po ci yang
86b3: rang ba'i bar du blang bar mi bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gi lub 'di yang sems can thams cad la gtang ste/ yongs su gtang na phyi rol gyi dngos po
86b4: rnams lta ci smos snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ / gzhan yang sems can gang dang gang la dngos po gang dang gang gis dngos po gang dag dang byed par 'gyur ba de yod na de dang de la de dang de mi dga' ba med pa dang 'gyod pa med par sbyin par bya ste/ lag pa
86b5: 'dod pa rnams la lag pa yang sbyin no/ / rkang pa 'dod pa rnams la rkang pa dang / mig 'dod pa rnams la mig kyang sbyin no// sha 'dod pa rnams la sha dang / khrag 'dod pa rnams la khrag dang / rkang 'dod pa rnams la rkang dang / yan lag dang / nying lag
