224a4: bltas na bdud sdig can de mya ngan gyi khang pa na 'drag cing yid rab tu mi dga' ba de mthong ngo / / de nas bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ga la ba dang bdud sdig can gyi khang pa ga
224a5: la ba der song ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kye 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ci'i phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas nas khyod mya ngan gyi khang
224a6: par zhugasu te 'dug/ de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag la rgyas par smras pa kye grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ shAkya'i rigs las shin tu g.yo dang sgrar ldan pa'i dge sbyong zhig
224a7: 'dir skyes te/ de skyes ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas/ rab tu g.yos par byas/ 'khrugs par byas te/ spangs par byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa 'di na
224a8: mkhas pa gang su tshangs pa'i dbang po 'am klu'i dbang po 'am gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po nas

224b1: gzhan yang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du mkhas pa su yang rung / de dag thams cad de la mchod pa'i phyir 'dod do// lo drug gi bar du gcig pu gnyis su med par 'dug ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'i sgyu ma bsgrubs
224b2: pas kho bos kyang rang gi stobs kun bstan par 'dod nas sde dang g.yog bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa drug dang de'i drung du dong ste/ kun du bskor nas bdud kyi stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / brtson 'grus
224b3: dang / pha rol gnon pa thams cad bstan kyang de'i spu'i khung bu gcig kyang dadangs shing 'jigs par bya ma nus na stan de las bskyod pa lta ci smos/ bgegs gzhan bya bar lta ga la nus te/ dmangs de lta bu'i sgyu shin
224b4: du bstan cing sa g.yo bar byas pas kho bo sde dang bcas te pham nas shing bcad pa bzhin du sa'i steng du lhung ngo / / de der 'dug ste de 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid med pa'i sgyu ma bsgrubs nas 'di ltar bdud kyi yul thams
224b5: c ad zil gyis mnan te rig pa bsgrubs nas stan de las langs te sems can rnams la rab tu bstan nas gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can su mkhas shing shes pa de dag kyang de lta bu'i sgyus
224b6: 'dran par byas te/ de dag gi sems dang / 'gro ba drag tu skye ba dang 'gro ba yang kho bos mi shes so// gang dag de la skyabs su dong ba de dag gi spu'i khung bu gcig tsam yang dang ngas pa dang 'khrugs par byed ma nus na
224b7: de la smrab 'am bskyod par lta ga la nus te/ deng kho bo'i g.yog mo lnga brgya dang / bu nyi khri dang tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma dmangs de la skyabs su dong nas chos nyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun na 'khod de/
224b8: kho bos de dag de dang phral bar ma nus so// de'i phyir stobs dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa/ dbang phyug dang ldan pa khyed kho bo'i grogs gyi sa dang / shAkya 'bu dmangs de srog dang bral lo//

225a1: de la sems can gang dag skyabs su song ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam par gzhig par bya'o// dge sbyong g.yo spu can nag po'i phyogs pham par byas te/ bdud kyi phyogs dkar po sdud par byas la de
225a2: phyin chad bde ba la reg par gnas par bya/ / de nas bdud me 'od ces bya bas 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa la bltas pa dang / de nas bdud me 'od kyis bcom ldan
225a3: 'das kyi sku mthong sbra dbyangs dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa thos so/ / mthong nas de spu zing zhes byed cing dang nges par gyur te/ de nas des bdud sdig can de la 'di skad ces smras so// ma lus ning na 'di ni ga zugs
225a4: bzang mchog/ bsod nams shes pas ring nas gnas gtsang ste/ nyon mongs rnam grol lam ldan yun ring lon// srid pa kun zad mya ngan rnams las thar/ khyod kyang mi rigs khro ba'i dab ma 'gro// gtsomachog 'di
225a5: ni srid pa gsum na skyabs/ / 'di la zhe sdang cung zad su bskyed pa// de ni rmongs shing bde ba nyams par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang bdud mu khyud bzang po zhes bya bas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// de ni 'phrul chen
225a6: bsod nams rab kyi mtshan/ / mi gnas 'gro ba kun las rab du thar// sdug bsngal ma lus zad pa'i lam ston pa// bdud brgya kun gyis gtses par bya mi nus/ sdig can gyis smras pa/ de'i skye bo dag la dbang byas te// khyod
225a7: kyi skye bo 'di yang de dbang 'gro/ / de yis ring po mi thogs yul stongs byed// 'u bu cag kyang gad du 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas bdud nags kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ni rab tu 'byor par gyur pa'i tshe/
225a8: den khyod kyis rang gi dpa' ba bstan// da ni rab tu dpung nyams re chad na// de rid ci phyir thams cad mkhyen la sngo// bdud ral gri zla ba zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// de ni su la'ang yid kyis khro ba med// mi gnas de ni

225b1: bsam pa nyid kyis gtsang / / khams gsum dag las thar cing 'gro bar rgyu// de la gzhan gyis gsad par mi nus so// sdig can gyis smras pa/ 'dod khams 'di na sems can gang 'khod pa/ 'dod la chags shing rgyal
225b2: dregs pas myos/ / de dgang phyir rtag 'brang phyag brnyan te// de dag tshogs pas ci phyir de mi sod// de nas bdud sa chu zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// snying po med cing sdu ma smig chu 'drar// dngos po kun shes srid pa rnam
225b3: par brtul/ / srid par ma chags nam mkha'i da bo nyid// de la bgegs byed nus par gal 'gyur// sdig can gyis smras pa/ mi'i 'jig rten 'di na de dbang yod// bza' btung zhim po sman dang gos bsnyen cing // tshor ba
225b4: gsum yang de'i sems la yod/ / ci phyir de la brlag par bya mi nus// bdud srid spong zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can sto phye chen po rnams kyis ni// rdzu 'phrul bdag cag yul na ci yod pa// don grub 'phrul
225b5: la cha shas mi reg na/ / de la ji ltar brlag par bya bar nus// sdig can gyis smras pa/ das ni de la zan bcad byas// de la rdo ba dag kyang 'phangs// de bzhin mi snyan tshig smras nas// gnas dag nas kyang rab tu bskyod// bdud
225b6: shes mig ces bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/ / khyod kyis gang tshe de la bgegs byas tshe// de ni khros pas cung zad 'tshig pa 'am// khyod la khro gnyer bzhin yang bstan byas sam// de las khyod kyis tshig ngan mngon
225b7: thos sam/ / sdig can gyis smras pa/ don so sor brtags pas rtag tu bzod/ 'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang gti mug bral// de ni sems can kun la byams sems ldan// 'dre bar spyod pa la yang de rtog go// bdud
225b8: thub dka' zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/ / kun sbyor gsum gyi zhags pas gang bcings pa// de la bdag cag nan tan bgegs bya mod// des ni skyon dang gti mug zhags pa spangs// de la ji ltar brlag par

226a1: bya bar nus/ sdig can gyis smras pa/ stobs thob khyed cag da'i grogs yin te// khyed rnams bag yod byos la de'ur chos// thams cad phyogs su ri'i phreng ba dang / sa 'di ma lus byin gyis chur brlab po//
226a2: mkha' las mi bzad sdug pa'i brag char dang // lcags kyi phye ma'i phung po rab tu dbab// lcags mda' mdung thung spu gri mda' bo che// de lus phye mar brlag phyir dbab par bya// kun nas rab tu rno ba'i rdo rje dang // mdung thung
226a3: ral gri thob rnams pha ba la/ / 'bar ba mngon 'phags sbyor ba de dag gis// shAkya'i bu de thal bar brlag par bya'o// de bzhin du bdud bye ba'i bar du thams cad kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras so// de nas bdud de dag thams
226a4: cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/ / de bzhin du 'dod par bgyi'o// rang rang gi gnas nas go bgos la sde dang g.yog tu bcas te 'dod do// bdag cag ge rdzu 'phrul dang / stobs kyi yul de dag thams cad
226a5: bstan par ni bya na/ dge sbyong gau tam de rtsal ci 'dra ba de'i mod la rab tu ston te/ khyod rang gis rig par 'gyur ro// de nas bdud bye ba rang rang gi gnas nas go bgos te/ bdud bye ba re re zhing yang g.yog stong stod ya lad rnam
226a6: pa mang po gyon pa lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa/ go cha rnam pa sna tshogs bgos pa dag dang chas te/ de'i nub mo 'das nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir phyin te/ yul ang ga ma ga d+ha'i drang thad kyi nam mkha' la 'khod nas
226a7: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum gang dag bcom
226a8: ldan 'das la sems ma dad cing gus par bya ba yid la byed pa med par gyur la/ chos dang dge 'dun la'ang sems ma dad pa yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das bkrongs su bcug nas/ de dag

226b1: kyang lag cha dang / go cha sna tshogs dang chas te de nyid na 'khod do// bdud sdig can ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su bsgyur nas/ drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba dbang phyug chen po la dad pa/ rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad
226b2: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyi pha rol tu son pa/ g.yog lnga brgya yod pa/ gangs kyi ri'i ros la gnas pa de'i mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so// gau ta ma'i rigs las skyes pa'i drang srong mchog mkhas shing mngon
226b3: par shes pa dag la gnas/ / ang ga d+ha na der 'dug de ring ni// rgyal po'i khab tu nges par bsod snyoms spyod// brtan por sna tshogs gsal ba'i gtam rnams kyis// de dang khyod du lhan cig smra bar byos// der khyod mngon shes dbang
226b4: po lnga po yang / / gdon mi za ba rab tu thob par 'gyur// de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste/ rang gi 'khor gyi bdud rnams la bsgo// ngas der mi mtshungs
226b5: blos bsams ci 'dra ba las khyod nyon cig/ bdag yul bdud kyi dregs chen 'joms pa'i sgra de mi ston par// rdzu 'phrul mthu dang ldan de shAkya'i bu la rang dgar smra// de rtag tshig 'jam slob ma dag la brtse ba bu la ma byams bzhin
226b6: de'i slob ma rgyags spangs gdon mi za bar sA rba ni/ grong khyer dag tu g.yeng ba med par mthar gyis rgyu ba na// de dag klu gar snyan mchog tshul gyis rang dgar myur du gzung // de thos shAkya khyu mchog ci nas yid spro med par bya//
226b7: bdud gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ glang chen rnga mos dge ma he stag gtum sgra drag dbyar dus kyi// 'brug sgra 'byin pa lta bu dum grong de'i phyi rol mur sprul te/ bdag cag lag cha mtshon thogs 'dag pa ngo mtshwa mngon sum de mthong na/
226b8: bslad cing mi dran rdzu 'phrul stor te de nas tha dad phyogs su 'gro// bdud gzhan zhig gis smras pa lam srad bzhi mdo rta babs dag na mi sdug gdong ma dngas 'khod// sna tshogs mtshon rnon mad 'a chen mda' zhags brla dgas

227a1: ral gri thogs/ nam mkha' las kyang mtshon cha'i sgra grag sprin las lci yang 'bebs// de nas sa g.yos 'jigs pas dbang med mAr du marud 'gyur// bdud de dag gis bdud kyi yul gyi stobs dang /
227a2: rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba de bzhin du thams cad rgya cher byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rjer byin gyi brlabs nas bdud kyi sgra yang mi 'byin/
227a3: phyogs bzhin ma dang ri yang med/ sprin nag po yang med// dus ma yin pa'i rlung yang med de/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang byin gyis brlabs kyis kru gang yang than char ba/ thigs pa gcig tsam yang mi 'bebs so// yang de'i tshe nyan
227a4: thos chen po bzhi snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i
227a5: khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / grong khyer gyi sgod de na bdud gzhon nu shin du daral bab pa/ byang bzhin bzang ba/ btsun pa'i cha byad dang 'dra ba lnga bcu klu len gar byed cing kun tu rgyu ste/ de dag gis lag
227a6: pa gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bzung nas srad du rmu gcing glu len gar byed de/ shA ri'i bul 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong gru long shig/ dge sbyong gar byos shig/ shA re'i bus smras pa/ grogs po dag byed kyis sngon
227a7: mthos pa'i gru zos par bya yis nyon cig/ bdud gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyis bcom bsnyungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu drug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so// skye mched dag gis shin du cho ga/ skyemached
227a8: dag gis bdag cag bslus/ / skye mched dag ni gsod pa ste/ skye mched dag gis mthar dpung do// phung po byas pas shin du cho ga/ phung po byas pas don de bdag cag bslus// po byas pa gsod pa ste/ phung po byas pa nges mthar dbyung //

227b1: 'di lta ste/ ba ha ra/ ba ha ra/ b+ha ra ba ha ma ri tse ba ha/ sa t+ya ba ha a ma ba ha swA hA/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu rgyug cing klu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang gsang sngags kyi tshig ladi dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud
227b2: gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin du dga' ste/ yid rab tu dang nas 'di skad ces smras so// mgon po bdag cag de ring bzod par gsol// 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig ston pa'i mchog khyod de/ phung po khyod kyis ji ltar 'jigs
227b3: bcas bshad/ / bdag cag de ltar rtag tu de mngon sum// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug
227b4: go/ / de nas maud gal gyi bu grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de nas yang bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu nas glu'i dbyangs kyi bar du ste 'di skad ces
227b5: smras so/ / khams nyid dag gis shin du chog/ khams nyid dag gis bdag cag bslus// khams nyid dag ni gsod pa ste// khams nyid bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo // tshor ba dag gis shin du chog/ tshor ba dag gis bdag cag
227b6: bslus/ / tshor ba dag ni gsod pa ste/ tshor ba dag gis mthar dbyung ngo // sems pa dag gis shin tu chog/ sems pa dag gis bdag cag bslus// sems pa dag ni gsod pa ste// sems pa bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo de/
227b7: 'du shes byas pas shin du chog/ 'du shes byas pas bdag cag bslus// 'du shes byas pa gsod pa ste// 'du shes byas pas ngas mthar dbyung // 'khor ba dag gis shin du chog/ 'khor ba dag gis bdag cag bslus//
227b8: 'khor ba dag ni gsod pa ste/ 'khor ba bdag gis mthar dbyud do// 'di lta ste/ A ma ba Am bsngam pa Ar dza na ra dza ha/ sha ma mya tha/ sha ma mya tha/ ga ga na ba swA hA// tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs

228a1: su bcad pa 'di dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud gnon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin du dga' ste/ yid rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phral ldan sbas pa 'phags la mthub
228a2: dbang sras/ / 'khor ba'i nyes la mnyam blta chos kyi sgron/ sdig spangs bdag cag ri mo gus pa skyes// sangs rgyas chos mchog dge 'dun ded skyabs so// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus
228a3: der tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
228a4: khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de nas yang bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu nas glu'i dbyangs kyi bar du ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// reg pa byas pas shin tu chog/ reg pa byas pas bdag cag bslus// reg pa
228a5: byas pas gsod pa ste/ reg pa bdag gis mthar 'byung ngo // bdag po dag gis shin du cho ga/ bdag po dag gis bdag cag bslus/ bdag po dag ni gsod pa ste// bdag po dag gis mthar dbyung ngo // 'khor ba dag gis
228a6: shin du chog/ / 'khor ba dag gis bdag cag bslus// 'khor ba dag ni gsod pa ste/ 'khor ba bdag gis mthar dpung ngo // srid pa kun gyis shin du chog/ srid pa kun gyis bdag cag bslus// srid pa kun ni gsod pa ste//
228a7: srid pa kun ni ngas mthar dbyung// 'dod pa'i dga' bas shin du cho ga/ 'dod pa'i dga' bas bdag cag slus// 'dod pa'i dga' bas gsod pa ste/ 'dod pa'i dga' bas ngas mthar dbyung // grogs dag tshe'i myung /
228a8: ste/ ri bzar chu drag mgyogs 'dran/ byis pa'i skyes pos mi shes te/ mi mkhas gzugs kyi drags pas myos// de bzhin du sbyar te/ me mkhas sgra'i dregs pas myos// mi mkhas dri'i dregs pas myos// mi mthas

228b1: ro'i dregs pas myos/ / mi mkhas reg gi dregs pas myos// grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste// ri bzar chu drag mgyogs 'dra na// byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te// mi mkhas chos kyi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas phung po'i dregs
228b2: pas myos/ / mi mkhas khams kyi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas longs spyod dregs pas myos// mi mkhas bde ba'i dregs pas myos// me mkhas rigs kyi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas 'dod pa'i dregs pas myos// grogs dag
228b3: tshe 'di myur 'gro ste/ ri gzang chu drag mgyogs 'dran/ byis pa'i skye bos ma shes te// mi mkhas kun gyi dregs pas myos// 'di sa ste brgag khargag/ kharga ga/ mun nyini// ma ba ta/ bi btaH/ kha ba te/ bra ma ar+tha/ dz+ye ti bta mAH/ tshedang
228b4: ldan pa byams mi'i bu gang po rgu ga cing glu'i dbyangs kyis bdud kyi bu rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste/ yid rab tu dga'
228b5: nas 'di sa ces smras so/ / khams rnams sgyu ma sdig cu 'dra ba dang // 'tshe ba'i 'jig rten rtog pas bskyed pa dang / zhi ba'i lam yang khyod kyis nye bar bstan// mchog sprin dkon mchog gsum la skyabs sumachi// bdud gzhon nu
228b6: bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbu sa der tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bugang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshes mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go// yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nub phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal
228b7: po'o khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / grong khyer gyi sgo de na bdud gzhon nu shin du dang la bab pa/ byang bzhin bzang pa btsun pa'i cha byad 'tshang ba lnga bcu glu len gar byed cing kun tu rgyu ba de dag gas lags
228b8: gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bzung nas srang du rgyu ga cing glu len gar byed de/ rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong glu long shig/ dge sbyong gar byos shig rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed kyis sngon

229a1: ma thos pa'i glu thos par bya yis nyon cig/ de dag gis gcom bsnyungs pa dang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyi 'di skad ces smras so// dngos po thams cad mi rtag sgyu ma nu bur bzhin// 'dus byas
229a2: g.yo ba'i rang bzhin gang la'ang rtag pa med/ / smig rgyu mthong nas zhig bzhin de la ther zug med// chos kun myur du 'jig par blo dang ldan pas shes// sdug bsngal chos gzer byas pa thams cad gang chags pa/ reg kun
229a3: bsdug bsngal khur yin tshor ba dag kyang med/ / ji ltar dad pa byeng chub lam bsgom pa sten byed pa/ de ltar sdug bsngal kun thar byed grogs gang yang med// chos kun mtshan nyid gcig ste 'dus shes spangs pa dag/ bdag med
229a4: ldan pas spyod kun rdzas kyi mtshan nyid bdag/ srog dang gso ba gang zag dang ni byed pa med// bdud kyi g.yo dag thod la sems ni byang chub bsngos// nam mkha'i glog bzhin dbang po dag la rnam shes 'byur// reg dang tshor dang
229a5: sems pa thams cad bdag med de/ / tshul bzhin brtags na rdzas ni ci yang yod ma yin// byis pa'i sde rnams bslus pas 'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'jug phung por thams cad tshul bzhin brtags na byed pa med// yang dag
229a6: mtha' ni sdong zhir mtha' rnams kun dang bral/ / byang chub lam spyod des ni 'dren pas byang chub brnyes// rmongs med chos nyid 'di ni chos su skyob pas gsungs 'di lta ste/ su mun de/ bi mun de sun da dza he/ si li sil
229a7: si li/ a ba si li/ a ba ha si li/ ta thA tA si li/ pU t+ya ko Ti si li swA hA// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'od dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud gzhon
229a8: nu lnga bcu po de dag shin du dga' ste/ yi de rab tu dang nas 'di skad ces smras so// sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song 'di 'dra'i chos ma thos// gti mug mi shes dngos pos sdig las ci bgyis pa/ rgyal ba'i sras la bdag

229b1: cag mngon sum deng bshags na/ 'grol ban phyer sangs rgyas nyid du sngon dge 'de bas// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
229b2: chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdung du 'dug go// yang de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi mthus srang de dpag tshad brgya tsam dugo/ skabs yangs par snang ste/ srad de'i dbus na gnas brtan shA ri'i bu ni byang phyogs su bltas te 'dug
229b3: maud gal gyi bu chen po ni nub phyogs su bltas te 'dug/ gang po ni lho phyogs su bltas te 'dug/ rab 'byor ni shar phyogs su bltas te'i dug nas gcig nas gcig du dpag tshad phyed phyed tsam na 'khod do// nyan thos chen po
229b4: bzhi po de dag gi dbus kyi sa'i phyogs na/ khru lnga bcus 'khor ba'i dpad ma chu ba ni 'dzam bu'i chub 'ogaser// 'dab ma ni ba dUr+ya sngon po// ze ba ni dpal gyi snying po/ snying po ni mu tig/ dri ni lha'i spros pas lhag pa/ 'jig
229b5: rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes bzhi gzung ste/ pad me las snang ba byung ngo // snang ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur te/ srad de na pad ma de 'bang du me gsum gyi khrun tsam du
229b6: snang ngo / / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bar du ni pad ma do'i 'phang du lha'i dpag tshad lnga bcu par snang ngo // sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du ni pad mo de'i 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya bar snang ngo // 'og min gyi lha'i bar du
229b7: ni pad ma de'i 'phang dpag tshad byed par snang ngo / / pad ma do'i 'dab ma dag las tshig dang don dang tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs byung ste/ sems can gang dag sa 'di la gnas pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa
229b8: de dag thos so/ / sangs rgyas zhing 'dir gang zag sdig pa med pa gcig skyes pa// gcig pus bdud kyi sde ni dpung dang gzhon par bcas pa bcom nas// sangs rgyas dpa' bo gcig gis chos kyi 'khor lo rab

230a1: tu bskor/ / nya gcig 'gro ba dag la phan phyir byon pa the tshom med// mkhas pa bstan bcos tshul mang rig pa chos don mthar 'dod pa// tshul shes pad nas skyes dang nye rgyal mchog 'dir ston pas btul// 'gro ba kun la pha/
230a2: don rig mkhas dam chos gsung ba tshe// thub pa smra mchog 'jig rten kun gyis mchod pas de ring gshegs/ dus gsum gshegs pa ston pa dge sbyong rgyal po bslab gsum 'chang // tshad med chos don rig pa mi dang lhar bcas
230a3: 'gro ba skyob/ / 'jig rten don dang phan spyod mkhas pa ye shes chen po'i sgron// dam pa gsung ba dri ma gsum spangs de ring 'dir kun ston// sdug bsngal pongs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad rnam grol zhing // 'jig rten don srad mi mnyel blo gros
230a4: mnga' bas spyad/ ma rig pa yis bsgribs pa'i mig can dag la yang // dam pa'i chos kyis mig ni ji bzhin rab tu sbyin// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di 'dir ni tshogs 'gyur gyis don gyi dam pa gzigs pa gzugs bzang mchog mda'
230a5: la/ stobs dang ldan zhing mchog dang mchog ma yin mkhyen pa/ smra ba'i seng ge ring po mi thogs 'dir gshegs so// 'gro ba sdug bsngal rgya mtshor gnas pa gzigs nas ni/ dbang po drug gi sdom pa'i mchog la rab gnas shing // mngon par
230a6: shes pa drug mkhyen drug gi rjes 'brang ba/ / de ni chos kyi rnga chen drung du yang dag gshegs// dbang po drug gi grong khyer gnas rnams rab 'jom pa/ don mchog dran pa drug gi kha lo bsgyur dbang po// pha rol chos drug mchog rnams rab tu bshad pa'i
230a7: phyir/ / drug gi sa bon smra ba'i seng ge 'dir gshegs so// 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug gi bar du pad ma de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // khyed cag tshogs de de ring dga' ba spyod/ bag med sems pa sred dang rgyags pas bsgrin
230a8: rtag tu rmongs shing dga' ba'i skom gyis myos/ / bag med gyur pas bde bshegs mchod mi byed// 'dod pas mi rtag chu'i zla ba bzhin// skye dgu'i 'khor ba'i zhags pa shin du sra// dgra ba dag la bag med ma thar pa// nams kyang mya ngan 'da' bar mi 'gyur

230b1: do/ rtag tu bag med zhi ba'i phyir mi 'jug/ dge dang mi dge sngon byas ma mthong ngas// rga dang na 'chi'i 'jigs pas kun zin cing // khyed cag ngan song sa la rab tu zhugs/ sbyin dang dul dang kun sdom bag yod la// sten cig sngon gyi legs/
230b2: byas rnams kyang srungs 'dod pa mi gtsang mtha' me dkun spongs la// bde bar gshegs pa'i skyabs su nye bar der// so ste de yi bka' la rab tu nyon// legs bshad de ni khyod kyi don chen te// shes rab rnam grol rab tu zhi ba'i rgyu// dam pa'i/
230b3: choso ldan mnyan pa don chen no// lha'i ris bcu drug gi bar du pad ma de'i 'dab ma las tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag byung ngo // mnyam bzhag pa sam tan dga' ba nyon mongs med// rab tu bsgrims te chos la rnam par bsgoms/ ma
230b4: 'khrul sems dang rnam par thar 'dod pas/ / zhe sdang rab tu spangs pa'i blo gyis shig/ rnam pa bcu su ma mtshan ma bstan pa yi// bzod pa mchog la rnam par bsgom par gyis// de ni nang rga las thar pa yi// shin du rnamathar mung du thob par
230b5: 'gyur/ / gang rnams gzugs kyi rnam tog sogal chags// ther zug rtag pa bdag brtan dngos por ba'o// de dag gi ni skye ba'i rgyun mi 'chad// de rnams ngan songs la shin sul gtan tu khams gsum bdag med rdzas med cing // byed med
230b6: rab dbang med par rnam par bltas nas/ / rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa gang sgom pa// de dag 'gro ba kun las thar bar 'gyur// skye dang 'jig grol chos 'di thams cad la nam mkha' 'dra bar gang rnams bsgom byed pa/ de dag 'chi med na med
230b7: naba'ang med/ / ngan 'gro med cing mi sdug phrad pa 'ang med// gang rnams dbang po dag la yid mi chags// lamade mchog ste shin du dag pa yin// de ltar shAkya seng ge 'di bzhin du// bdud rnams bzhi po rnam par 'jom par 'gyur// gang
230b8: dag g.yo ba btul nas gnyis spang daphyir/ / ci yang med cing mtshan ma kun spangs pa// tshul gcig rnam par sgom par byed pa rnams// de dag la ni lam mchog 'di bshad do// bdag po med cing byed pa med gyur par// chos 'di than

231a1: cad stong par bsgoms nas su/ / smon pa spangs na bla na med pa yi// byang chub nam mkha'i rang bzhin reg par 'gyur// de lta bu'i don gyi tshig gis chos kyi sgra de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag tshogs
231a2: te/ srang gi dbus na pa dam de 'khor bar 'dug go// 'og min gyi lha ba grangs med dpag du med pa'i bar du 'og min nas babs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir pad ma de'i 'khor yug tu 'khod de// bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas
231a3: kun rabaltas te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srang gi dbus na pad ma de las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa dag byung ste/ tshes mnyan pa'i phyir mi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis pad mede 'khor bar 'khod
231a4: ngamathong ngo / / de nas bdud sdig can gyis steng du bltas na/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug gi gnas thams cad na yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa dpag tu med pa dag gis pad ma de 'khor bar 'khod pa mthong
231a5: do/ / de nas bdud sdig can rab tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la gcags te/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur cing / lus rdul ste lus 'dar nas nam mkha' la rgyug cing skad chen po bos te bdud gzhan la 'di skad ces smras so// mi 'gyur
231a6: yid kyis nga yi tshig nyon la/ / de la stobs med bdag yul 'dir dbang med// thub stobs yon tan shin du dri med de// skye bo bstan phyir 'jig rten 'dir 'dug go// lha mi dga' ba'i dam pa 'dir byung ste// 'gro mchog ma lus nges par
231a7: nim po/ / bde gshegs tshig la skom zhing rab tu dga'// yon tan rab mchog zhi ba'i lam du 'gro// 'di ni 'jig rten gsum po slu ba dge sbyong sku yin te// lha mi mang po thams cad yid cig pad ma 'khor bar 'dug/ de ni 'jigs pa'i skad
231a8: kruzung myur du ri'i char phob ste/ / ci nas bdud kyi sde btsan mtshon gyis deng bcom 'dir brlag gyis// de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gi phan byed tshig 'di nyon cig khyod kyi chos rig na bdag

231b1: sde brlag pa mthong yang zhi bar ci yi phyir mi 'gro/ / bde gshegs bzi brjid sku dang dpal 'chang gzugs mthong bdag cag myos// sangs rgyas 'dren pa ma gtogs 'di na skyabs rab mchog gzhan med// de nas bdud gzhan zhig rab tu
231b2: ru zhing gdong mchog tu khro bas non pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ / log pa'i lam du zhugs shing lam dman pa// bdag gi stobs mtha med pa'ang mi shes sam// 'dren pa la yang gang daphyir khyod sngob// ngo mi tsha'am 'dzem par
231b3: mi bya'am/ / bdag cag stobs ni shin du brlag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthu yis 'gro ba ma lus pa// pad ma'i drung du nye bar der 'dong ste// chos thos tshim pas lus kyang shin du dag/ bdag cag rnam par 'jigs shing skrag gyur te/ lus
231b4: ni dring stobs dang brtson 'grus stor/ / ji tsam skad cig brlag par ma gyur pa// de'i bar du thub dbang skyabs su 'dod// de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can khyod ni chos kyi spyod pa spangs shing sdig
231b5: byed dga'/ / sangs rgyas mgon 'di 'gro ba'i phan don mkhas shing dge ba'i mchog/ grong khyer 'dir byon bdag cag mur du dga' zhing dang bas blta// 'jig rten gsum mchod srog chags kun gyi sman la skyabs su 'dod// de nas nam
231b6: mkha'ade nyid nas bdud dbyangs kyi blo gros shes bya ba des sgra chen por 'di skad ces smras so/ / khyed kun tshogs pas gus shing dga' ldan de'i tshig nyon cig/ sdig pa'i lta ba kun bzlog lus btung ngag yid 'thun spyod de// khro spangs
231b7: rab dag 'thub pa'i gsung mchog la yang dga' dadang bskyed/ / sangs rgyas mngon sum rnyed dka' skyabs dor de ring dgus par mchod// de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud thams cad nam mkha' las babs nas// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
231b8: gyi sgo rin po che sna bdun las byas te/ bdud la la ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'bad cing 'khod do// la la ni tshangs pa'i cha bya dngul la ni dbang byed

232a1: sapa ma bya / la ma ma / la ga na / la la la / na / man pa shA ga
232a2: lal ni gzhon nu'i dbyung du/ / la la ni nam thos kyi ba'i na byang nga// la la ni lags skyes po'i byad la lani migs pa gin kyang nga// la la ni yul 'khor bsrung gan byad du// la lani rgyal chen bzhi pa phal ba'i nabyang du/ khalan nyim
232a3: byu / / la la ni nA ba'i mabyang du// la la ni gar ma'i na byang nga/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi mthang nga/ la la ni nam mkha' lding gin byang du/ la la ni mi'am ci'i na byang du/ lal ni lho'i phye chen po'i cha byang du/ la la ne rin po che'i byang du/ la
232a4: nigaser gyi rgyan gyi bya sa/ la la nanor bu na po tsho na bya dang / la la nor na po che'i shing ljon pa chen po'i nabyang du/ la la ni rgyal rigs kyi na byad du// lal ni gzhan ma stegs can gyi cha byang du/ ma mni 'khong mo ngon pa che'i nabyang du//
232a5: mnan dzin pa rgyad / la lan thang bad po ces paku ga ca / lal ni'i rtsal po sbyin gyi thamasan dang / lalan zung med da po chechen byad dpa/ la la pong dpon bcan pa yang lalanidzin
232a6: po rin po che'i mabyang d+ha/ bdag nyid mngon par sprul ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// la la ni god la dog sngol byad 'phrul dang / dz+nyAn dkar pos brgyan par bdag nyid mngon par wA/
232a7: com ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gzugs dade/ rgyal mtshan dang / bad na dmar po dang / mu rtag gi phreng ba thogs shing 'bang dun la'i sring can gyi rnam ma kha dkyil na 'khod do// la la na dag shing kha dog dag
232a8: byad 'phrul dang / skud pa kha dog leb rgan te/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / bad na ser po dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thogs shing 'khod do// la la ni leb rgan kha dog leb rgan la gser gyi gos dang // byang 'phrul dang / lhab

232b1: lbub ste/ bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan 'thing ka thogs shing 'khod do// la la ni dmar zhing kha dog dmar la mu tig dkar po'i char 'bebs so// la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la mu tig dmar po'i char 'bebs so// la la
232b2: lha drang srong gi kha dog du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ nam mkha' las me tog gi char mngon par 'bebs so// lal ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas nam mkha' las lha'i spos sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs
232b3: so/ lal ni dri za'i kha dog gis lba'i sil snyan sna tshogs rdung ngo // la la ni lha'i bu mo'i kha dog gis rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod du spos chu thogs te sa la chag chag 'debs so// la lon 'ching bu nag po lta bu'i kha dog ste spos sna tshogs kyis
232b4: rab tu bdug par byed do/ / la la ni lha'i bu'i na byad kyis gar byed cing bu'i dbyangs 'byin to// la la ni kha dog sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la bstod do// bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor la lani
232b5: bcom ldan 'das phyogs gal bzhugs pa de logs su mngon par phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rin po chen ma pa sna tshogs thogs so// la la ni srad dang khang pa dang / khyim dang / skar khung dang / rta bzas dang bsil
232b6: khang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / sgo dang / shing dang / gzhal med khang nams na 'dug cing thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gang
232b7: gi tshe bdud de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas te dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skyabs su dong bar mthong ba de'i tshe/ rab tu 'khrugs te skrag cing myos nas rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so// bdag la phyin chad grogs med de/ bdag gi dpal
232b8: dang thams cad stor/ bdag ni bdud kyi yul nas 'khyams/ brtson 'grus tha ma brtsam par bya// bdag gis pad ma rtsa ba gcad// pad ma bcad dang kun 'khrugs te// des na sems can phyogs phyogs 'gro// de ni tha ma'i stobs yin no//

233a1: bdud sdig can gyis de ltar bsams nas rlung lta bur nam mkha' las babs te/ mang gi pad mag la ba der phyin nas pad ma de'i sdong po yan cha dang zung bar 'dod na reg par yang ma nus// pad ma'i 'dab ma gcad par
233a2: 'dod na de dag kyang ma mthong / pad ma'i snying po'i lag pas brdab par 'dod na de yang ma dmigs te/ dper na glog snang yang mi dmigs pa bzhin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na grib ma snang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du pad mo de yang snang
233a3: mod kyi mi dmigs so/ / gang gi tshe bdung sdig can gyis pad ma de mthong yang mi dmigs shing reg par mi rung ba de'i tshe// 'khor thams cad rab tu dngangs par bya ba'i phyir skad drag cing che la 'jigs pa'i sgra dbyung bar 'dod na de
233a4: yang ma nus so/ / yang stobs chen po'i dreg shul gyis lag pa gnyis sa chen po la brdabs te rab tu bskyod par 'dod na reg par yang ma nus te ma dmigs so// 'di lta ste/ dper na la la zhig nam mkha' la rdob par 'dod na ma
233a5: dmigs pa de bzhin du bdung sdig can gyis mthong yang reg par mi rung zhing mi dmigs nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ci nas sems can 'dus pa rnams brtags te sems rnam par 'khrugs par bya'o snyam nas sems can dang/
233a6: mthong yang mi dmigs shing reg par yang mnuso// de nas bdud sdig can rab tu ngu zhing sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lus shing ljon pa bzhin du 'dar te// gdong mchim can gyis phyogs bzhir blta zhing 'di skad ces smras so// dge
233a7: skyong gis ni 'gro kun bsdu phyir de ring sgyu 'di byas/ / 'di ltar bdag ni mdun 'dir bslad bzhin skad cig myos par song // yul dang rang gi stobs las nyams shing bdag gi srog kyang zad// des bslang brlag par ma gyur bar du
233a8: bdag gnas myur du 'gro/ / bdag gis gnas su 'gro bar 'dod na der yang 'gro bar ma nus te/ rab tu skrag cing ngus nas 'di snyam du sems so// bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs zad de bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di'i dbang du song du'ong/

233b1: dgra 'di'i mdun du bdag gi srog zad par 'gyur du 'ong gis 'dir mi snang bar byas te/ ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas pa'i sems can gcig gis kyang bdag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa mi mthong bar sangs rgyas
233b2: kyi zhing mi 'jed kyi pha rol tu 'chi ba'i dus bya'o snyam na/ 'on kyang mi snang bar bya ba'am/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'bros kyang ma nus de/ de nyid du mgul pa bcing ba lngas bcings par bdag gis mthong nas ra
233b3: bres shing skrag ste/ skad chen por ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so// kyi hud bu dang gnyen shes sdug pa khyed rnams phyis mi mthong ngo zhes zer ro// de nas bdud dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha byang du 'dra
233b4: par gyur te/ / des bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// ci phyir khyed dang mya ngan yid kyis du gdong sgra chen 'bod/ 'gro ba kun gtso thub mchog skyabs su ma 'jigs myur du song // 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon skyabs dang /
233b5: gnyen sdug bsngal gsum sel ba/ 'di la bsnyen bkur zhi 'gro bde ba thob par 'gyur yang dag/ de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag gi tshig snyan pas dge sbyong go'u ta mal skyabs su song la/ bcings pa 'di las
233b6: bdag grol bar bya'o snyam du bsams te/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang zag gi mchog skye ba dang / rga ba dang /
233b7: nab dang / 'chi ba las rab tu zar par mdzad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bdag skyabs su mchi'o// 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// thub mchog myur du 'jigs chen mi bzang bcing ba 'di las
233b8: zol/ de ring slad chad bde gshegs gtso bo mchog skyabs bdag mchis te/ gti mug gis ni bdag ljongs khyod la khros shing nongs chen gyis// mngon sum khyod bzhug spyan sngar de dag so sor bshags par bgyi//

234a1: gang gi tshe bdud sdig can gyis tshig snyan pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song ba de'i tshe na bdag grol ba snyam du shes so// yang gang gi tshe 'khor 'di nas bdag 'gro'o snyam du bsams pa de'o//
234a2: tshe yang mgul pa bcing ba lngas bcings par bdag gis shes te/ gang gi tshe gang du yang 'gro bar ma nus pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la mgon dang / skyabs su sems bskyed nas yang bdag nyid grol bar shes so//
234a3: lan bdun gyi bar du bdag bcings pa dang grol bar shes te de nyid du 'dug go/ 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las// bdud btul ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o// // bam po bzhi pa// gong du
234a4: smos pa'i bar du ste/ / nyan thos chen po bzhi po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ba bdud gzhon nu de dag gis dge sbyong glu long shig/ dge sbyong gar byos shig
234a5: ces spyod pa ma yin pa byed du bcug nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag kyang srang gi dbus na rgyug cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi tshig dang ldan pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyis gang gi tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa de'i tshes chen
234a6: bo 'di rab tu g.yos so/ / skad cig de nyid la lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po brgya stong mang po bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dang pa rnams
234a7: gdod mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ / chos kyi kha lo bsgyur mchog mya ngan med bzhugs kyang // rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di lta bu'i gnas gyur te// nyan thos de dag la ni rgyal ka deng byas pa/ 'gro ba rnams kyis
234a8: mthong na dad par gal 'gyur/ / de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'amaci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po bye ba khrag khrig mang po gdod mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das

234b1: gal ba dang lpags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// da ltar bstan pa 'di'i gnas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun gzigs te// bstan pa'i chag bsrung slad du/ kun mkhyen
234b2: btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar nga nyid der song ste/ gzhon dpung bcas pa'i bdud bdul la// skye bo mang po thams cad kyang // mya ngan 'das grong 'gro bar bya// de nas bdud
234b3: de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs cig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/ bdud kyi yul bsam gyis
234b4: mi khyab klu'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab/ las rnams kyi las kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal tam/ yul thams cad kyi nang na ni sangs rgyas kyi yul khyad par du 'phags
234b5: pa'i mchog lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan 'di la bzhugs bzhin du bdud bye ba khrag khrig rab tu pham par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi phung po bye ba khrag khrig rab tu bstan pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa
234b6: dang / lta ba'i rgyal mo dral ba dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la gzung bar spyod mod kyi/ 'on gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das deng gi dus la gshegs pa'i mi rigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
234b7: sems can gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad badrad du gyur la// de dag re re'i bdud kyi stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs kyang sa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de tsam du gyur te/ de dag thams cad ngal bsad par
234b8: shem yang spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la yang gnod par mi nus so/ / ngas ni 'di na 'dug bzhin du bdud bye ba khrag khrig rnams rab tu pham par bya ba dang / gdul bar nus te bdadag yog dang bcas pa 'di ni ma gtogs so// yang ngal

235a1: mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bdud 'di dag gis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad bdud kyi stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi bkod pas brgyan pas/ de dag la snying brtse ba'i
235a2: phyir 'gro bar bya ste yongs su spyod do/ / de nas bdud de dag rab tu dga' zhing dang bskyes nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// ji tsam na gdan las bzhengs par bzhed
235a3: pa dang / de nas 'od ma'i tshal bsrung ba'i lha mo mthu mdzes shes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gdod mchi ma can du 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan de ring gshegs pa'i dus ma lags// grong
235a4: khyer 'di dag kun nas bdud kyis bltam/ re re la yang shin du ma rungs pa/ bye bas smra ba'i seng ge bskor cing mchis// zhe sdang rab 'bar rno ba'i mtshon thogs te// khyod dgrongs slad du 'khrugs pa'i sems kyis gnas/ mgon po
235a5: rnam pa kun tu deng ma gshegs/ / 'jig rten rtsa lag brlag par ma bzhud cing // gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs pa de'i tshe// gtsug lag khang gi lha mo snang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi
235a6: zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / sdig can dag ni lnga stong po// mtshon char bcas pa mchis pa ni// btsam med de dag khyod la sdongad // thub chen de ring ma gshegs shig/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das
235a7: gtsug lag khang nas byung ba de'i tshe/ sman gyi lha mo grub pa'i blo gros shes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten sgron ma brlag gyur na// kyi hud chos kyi lam stor
235a8: cing / / chos kyi tshul ni rab tu 'jig/ chos kyi gru yang 'jig par 'gyur// 'jig rten kun na rgya chen chos kyi ro ni nyams par 'gyur// 'gro ba 'dir ni nyon mongs g.yo can gdug pas shin du bltam// sa 'di bde gshegs thub pa'i mchog

235b1: lam rung 'gyur ba las/ / ji ltar shin du 'byung ba'i mthu ni bdag la cim mchis// khyod brlags bgyi srad 'di na rab tu mi bzang mang po dag/ sdig pa'i chos can dal zi ste re mtshon rnon thogs shing mchis// bde bar gshegs pa'i 'jig
235b2: rkyen bzung skad bdag gi tshig gsol to/ / stobs bcu grub par bzhud de de ring grong khyer ma gshegs cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi ngang nas bzhud pa dang / de na keng gi lha mo 'od 'chang zhes bya ba de snying brtse ba
235b3: ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / thams cad don grub thub pa yid bzhin rdzogs khyod ma rung gyur na ni// mgon po khams gsum 'di dag de'u mig ni stong par 'gyur/
235b4: nam mkha' 'di la sbrul gyi rked chings rno ba'i mnga' dang mtshon thogs shing // khyod dkrongs slad du kha nas me 'bar rgyu yis nga ni der ma gshegs// de nas sgo// rang gi lha mo 'od zer chu'i lha zhes bya ba de sgra cher ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi
235b5: zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / grong khyer bzang po 'di na bram zer ming btags stong phrag nyi shu po mda' dang spu gri mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs te snying rje med par blta/ gcig pas gcig mi bzang ba
235b6: snying rje med pa stong phrag nyi shu rnams khyod dkrongs slad du 'di na mchis kyis gtsang ma'i zhal ni ma gshegs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo/ nga du byon pa dang / der rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer bsrung ba'i lha mo ta ma la'i snying po
235b7: zhes bya ba de nam mkha' las sgra cher ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du rings par song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das shul 'di seng ge rnga mo glang
235b8: chen smon pas bskor/ / dge slong rnams la gtse slong bdud kyi rnam mang gnod pa bgyid// sa 'dir ston pa khyod dkrongs slad du mu stegs gzhan yang brtson// sprin dbyangs 'od 'bar lha klu thugs brtse'i slad du ma gshegs shig/

236a1: bcom ldan bdud btul khyod kyis bstan pa rnam zhig dang // sgyu ma bgyis pa mi mthun gdong can bdud mthong nas/ lha mi klu dang mi 'am ci'i dbang po rnams// kun 'dus mi dga' skra gnas shin du rnam par 'khrugs/
236a2: dam chos cher zhig pa dang 'jig rten 'khrugs kyur dang / nam mkha' skar me'i 'od stong nyi zla grur mthong nas// 'gro mchog kye ma mi bzad glad pa deng drag rdob// bde gshegs ma rung 'grur bar kun dogs kyi hud mchi// mthong ba'i
236a3: ma'adi gas shing / / chos kyi sgron ma zad par 'gyur// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grongs pas brlag/ chos kyi chu yang skam par 'gyur// dam chos spyod pa 'jig rten du// ma rung 'gyur ba nyer gnas tshe// mi dge ba'i bdud rnams
236a4: kyang / / 'di dag tu ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas lha mo des bcom ldan 'das phyir ldog par ma mthong nas gdong mchi ma can gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// thub pa 'jig rten kun la gzigs su gsol// smra mchog de ring brlag
236a5: bar ma bzhud cig/ bdag gi grong du ma rung khyod gyur na// 'jig rten gsum gyis rtag smad 'gyur du mchi// 'dren pa bdag gi tshig gson sems can mchog/ bdag gi grong du brlag par deng ma bzhud// sems can thugs brtse'i
236a6: srang nga 'dir bzhes te/ sems can se bas gtses pa 'jigs thar mdzod// dam pa brnyes nas sgrol bar rab 'gyur bar// sngon gyi dam bcas de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs// sems can mang po sdug bsngal du mas gdungs
236a7: srog chags rnams kyi gtso bo dbugs phyung shig/ sku mchog bskal pa bye ba mang por bzhugs// kye ma 'dod la chags pa byis pa'i sde// de rnams zhi bgyid skad du chos lam shong // skye mched dbang po don ni rang bzhin stong // de nas
236a8: bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du gshegs pa dang / de nas si'i lha mo gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i lha mo khri dang lhan cig skrag shig cing gdod mchi ba can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di

236b1: skad ces gsol to/ / rab tu sbyin la dgongs shing khyod kyis ni rgya mtsho bzhi bsnyams pa'i thag bstsal cing / dpur dang rus pa khor yug ri rab tsam// spyan yang gang ga'i bye ma rnyed stsal to// sngon ni rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sras dang btsun
236b2: mo grong chen de bzhin te/ / gnas dang gos dang mal chazas skom dang / de bzhin nad pa dgal 'dod sman stsal// rang byung mchog rab la ni mchod pa mdzad// khyod kyis bag yod par yang tshul khrims bsrungs// bzod pa dang ni
236b3: thos pa rtag tu bsnyen/ par 'dzin mar 'dzin pa yang de bzhin no// bya ba dka' ba dag kyang mtha' yas spyad/ sems can du mnyon mongs thar par mdzad/ gang sngon khyod kyis smon lam btab ba ni// lam mchog ston pa sangs
236b4: rgyas nyid gyur cig/ chu bo chen po las ni 'gro ba bsgral// 'jig rten la yang shin du chos bstan te// sdug bsngal ma lus par ni bsal bar gyi/ sems can mang po 'jigs med grong khyer gzung / sems can de dag dgos pa yongs
236b5: rdzogs shing / / byang chub dam pa la ni shin du khod// 'di ni lam por sdig pa spyod pa rnams// tshul khrims thos bshig mgon pos bzod par mdzod// 'di dag sgrol tshig dam bcas dgongs su gsol// bskal pa bye ba
236b6: mang por chos ston te/ / bgon po chu bo dag las 'jig rten sgrol// 'di dag yan lag brgyad kyis chu yis khrus// mgon po mchog rab khyod dang 'dra ba ni// 'jig rten gsum po 'di na 'ga' ma mchis// bdag grol 'jig rten
236b7: 'di dag grol bar mdzad/ / srid gsum rgya mtsho las kyang 'gro bsgrol// khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig/ rtag tu zhugs shing chos ni bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo Shang nas gshegs pa dang /
236b8: skad cig de nyid la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mar po nam mkha' la rgyu zhing gdong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag rnams kyis bde gshegs sngon mthong bzhi ba'i

237a1: dus la shin du slob ma dul/ / chos rnams rgya cher ston pa mdzad pa na de la de lta bu'i bgegs ma byung // ston pa 'di ni shin dus nal// rgya chen po yis rang byung nyid brnyes te/ thub dbang 'gro ba yongs smin mdzad skad du//
237a2: 'jig rten nyon mongs bsgribs la chos ston cing // smra ba'i seng ge 'di na bzhugs bzhin sdig can dag ni bye ba stong mang po// de ltar chos rnams rab tu 'jig par bgyid// sangs rgyas dpa' bogrod du deng ma gshegs//
237a3: nas lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to// sngon gyi rgyal ba 'jig rten phan brtson pa// de dag yul cig 'khor lo bskor gyur pa/ 'di ni gang du gshegs pa der yang bskor// de ring ma rung bar ni gyur ter// de nas yang lha mo
237a4: gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / ded dpon 'dir ni thugs rje'i slad// shin du sems can don mdzad spyad// de ni de ring grong khyer 'dir// brlag par 'gyur snyam bdag rtog go// yang de'i tshe lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
237a5: dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong / gdod la mchi ma zag cing ngom zung pa dag nam mkha'i ngos kyi lam las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
237a6: 'khod nas bdag nyid la rnam pa mang po byed de/ la la ni skra 'bal/ la la ni rgyan 'grol// la la ni gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan snyol// la la ni bdag nyid kyi lus sa la rdog la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dzin//
237a7: la la ni shin du nyon mongs par du/ la la ni lag pas brang rdung/ la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung na 'dug cing so bya bzhin du 'gre ldog/ la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te/ bstod cing phyag 'tshal
237a8: bar byed/ la la ni bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang gos dang / phyang 'phrul dang gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang ras bcos bu dag mngon par 'thor ro// de nas lha gzhan bye ba mang

237b1: pos mgrin gcig tu skad mthon por 'di skad ces gsol to/ / 'jig rten don slad 'di bas mang ba yi/ bya bar dka' ba khyod kyis rab tu spyad/ zad pa'i dus deng 'dir ni khyod skyes gyis/ btang snyoms mdzod la mi gshegs
237b2: bzhugs su gsol/ / sdig med khyod kyis sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyung ngu mdzad/ lha dang mi rnams dbang du mdzad pa shin du nyung// shin du yun ring chos rnams ston cing khyod bzhugs la// srid pa gsum gyi rgya mtsho 'di las grol
237b3: pa bsgral/ dge ba'i las rnams bgyid cing sa bon yongs smin te// bdud rtsi'i snod du gyur pa'i sems can du ma la// khyod kyi thugs rje bskyed de so sor rab ston la// chu bo las ni 'jig rten nyams thag bsgral bar mdzod//
237b4: 'gro ba dgon pa'i dbus song 'khyams gyur cing // 'khor ba'i dgon par shin du lam stor ba// de dag la ni lam mchog so sor ston// 'phags pa'i chos mchog tshig gis thar par mdzod// chos kyi 'khor lo dam
237b5: pa gang bskor ba/ de ni khyed kyi thugs rje ngo mtshar rmad// rlabs chen thugs mnga' ring du bzhugs su gsol// 'gro ba rnams ni mgon med ma gyur cig/ de nas lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to// nam 'dren
237b6: rgyal mo cang gyur na ni/ / 'jig rten 'di ltar ma lus ldongs par 'gyur// yan lag brgyad lam rnam thar gsum gyi rgyu// 'dir ni yod ye thams cad ma mchis 'gyur// ngag lus sems las skyes dge sa bon dag/ bdag
237b7: cag bag yod gyur pas 'dir btab ste/ / de slad bdag cag bde ba kun dang ldan// bsod nams 'byung gnas 'dir brlag ma gyur cig/ yang de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag de nyid du 'dus
237b8: par gyur te/ de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// sa 'dir bye ba'i bdud rnams nyer lhags kyang // thub pa rlabs chen thugs mda' nam yang ni// ma rung mi 'gyur khyed cag ma 'jigs shig/ dge ba 'di la bdag cag mngon

238a1: sam gyur/ dpag tshad sum bcu drug du mgyogs shing drag shul ldan pas kun tu bskor/ sna bgrang ral gri mtshon rnon rtsub pa'i sgra sang 'jigs pa bdud kyi sde// byang chub snying por lhags pa de dag 'jigs shing brlang
238a2: chung na/ da ltar don brnyes grags pas khyab pa de lag la bgegs shig byed// de nas lha mo gzhan zhig ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so// sngon byung ni bdud kyi sde gcig yin te de dag dpud mi che// 'di ni bye ba khrag khrig ba rud kyi sde
238a3: ste shin du dpung che bas/ / 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa 'di ni brlag par 'gyur du rab tu dogs// de brlag na ni 'jig rten 'di dag shin du snang med 'khyam par 'o// de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis
238a4: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'jus nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / blo zhan bdag cag gi ni tshig gson te/ dge ba bzhugs shing gtso bo thugs rje can// lha mang bya ba mya ngan chen po sa gdungs// de la chos kyi bcud kyis de
238a5: gtor cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la byams pa yangs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs nas/ de dag shin du dbugs phyung ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// der
238a6: khyebyed ma 'jigs khyed ni ma skrag shig/ bdud rnams thams cad bzhom bcas gcig char du// tshogs kyang spu gcig skrag par mi nus na// nga yi lus kun la ni smos ci dgos// deng ni 'jig rten thams cad dbugs phyung ste//
238a7: yis rtag dus 'dir chos bshad do// lam rnams stor ba la ni da nyid kyis// dri ma med pa yang dag lam bstan bya// ngas sngon bya ba dka' ba mang po byas// zas dang skom yang shin du rgya cher byin// gnas dang sman yang mi nyur sbyin/
238a8: byin pas// nga la deng su gnod par byed par nus// ngas ni rta dang glang chen shing rta dang // lhab lhub phyang 'phrul dag gis brgyan rnams dang // bran pho bran mo grong rdal yul 'khor btang // nga la su zhig gnod par byed par nus// chung

238b1: mthu bo tso mo bran mang dang / / yid 'ong dbang phyug sa steng rgyal po'i rigs// sems can rnams la phan phyir ngas byin rlob// nga lus de ring ci phyir 'jig par 'gyur// mgo dang sna dang rna ba mig gnyis dang // lus dang lpags pa khrag
238b2: dang rkang lag bcas/ / nga'i srog kyang lus can rnams la btang // su zhig nga la 'tshe bar byed par nus/ ngas ni sangs rgyas bye bar rab mang la// gus ldan bdag gi las nas shin du mchod/ rtag du tshul khrims thos dang
238b3: bzod la dga'/ / nga la su zhig brlag par byed par nus// ngas sngon shin du bya dka' mang po rnams// mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu yim byas// lus kun bcad kyang nga la 'khrug med na// nga la rnam par 'tshe ba su zhig nus
238b4: nyon mongs pas brtul nges par nga sangs rgyas/ / sems can thams cad la ni bya mas sems ldan// khro med kha dog tha ba nga la med// nga'i 'dun na de ring su zhig nus// ngas ni bdud kyi dpung rnams tshogs pa btul// ngas
238b5: ni bdud mar bye ba pham par byas/ / khyed kun rnam par thar par nges par bya// grong du ci phyir mi 'gro ma 'jigs shig/ sems can don phyir phyogs bcu 'di dag na// sangs rgyas la la gang dag bzhugs pa rnams// /
238b6: sangs rgyas kun dang byang chub sems dpa' yang // rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams ni kun na bsogs// zhing rnams mtha' dag rab tu gang bar bya// bsod nams ye shes dag gis gnas par bya// sangs rgyas de dag tshul bcas
238b7: kun gnas pas/ sangs rgyas dag gi dgongs pa'i mdzad pa bya// yang de'i tshe lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi'amachi dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin bye ba khrag khrig
238b8: brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas 'di skad ces smra dngo mtshar zad du byung ba'i grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / ngo mtshar chen po rdzad

239a1: du byung ba grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dbugs byung ngo // bcom ldan
239a2: 'das kyis bdud kyi phyogs pham par mdzad do/ / sems can rnams kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa bsal to// sems can rnams kyi nga rgyal gyi ri rab tu bsnyil to// skye ba'i shing ljon pa bcad do// 'chi bad
239a3: gi nyi ma phye mar brtags so/ / ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal to// gzhan mu stegs can rab tu dang par rabaskur to// chu bo bzhi snams so// chos kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar mdzad do// byang chub kyi lam ston to// bzod pa dang
239a4: des pa la btsud do/ / bsam gtan gyi bde ba la btsud do// bsam gtan gyi bde ba la rtser stsal to// 'phags pa'i bden bzhi khong du chud par mdzad do// ston pa bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po mnga' bas lha dang bcas pa'i
239a5: 'jig rten skye ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral to/ / sems can rnams 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i grong khyer du rab tu btsud do// de nas lha dang mi de dag gis bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang lbab lbub
239a6: dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mchod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lam de phyag dar byas so/ / lha'i gos dang / me tog dang lha'i ras bcos bus kun du g.yogs so// lha'i me tog man 'dar ba dang mna'ad
239a7: ba chen po dang pa ru sha ka dang bu ru sha ka chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang mdog mdzes chen po dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad mas kun tu g.yogs so// gang du bcom ldan 'das
239a8: kyis zhabs gnyis 'dor ba'i lam de'i ngos gnyis su lha'i rin po che'i sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa mngon par sprul te/ lha'i ras bcos bu dang mu tig gi phreng ba dang lag rgyan dang rna rgyan dang / mgo'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan

239b1: to/ / shing de dag gi bar bar du lha'i rdzing bu grang zhing zhim pa'i chu ngang zhing rnyog pa med la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus kun du gang ba khor khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dag sprul te/ bar sdang la
239b2: rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi phred ba bzung zhing gser gyi phye ma dag gi char yang phab bo// dngul dang bai dUr+ya'i phye ma dang / a ga ru dang rgya spos dang / dus kyi rje
239b3: su 'brang ba dang / ta ma la'i 'dab ma'i char yang rab tu phab bo// go shir sha dang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char yang lam dar phab bo// lha'i rgyan sna tshogs gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang nor bu dang / mu tig
239b4: dag gis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad brgyan to/ / gro dngam grong khyer gyi phyi rol na yang lha dang mi rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir lam mdzes par byed do// grong khyer gyi nang na bdud dam bdud kyi
239b5: 'khor rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bkod pa dag bkod pa byas so/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa nas ting nge 'dzin
239b6: de la snyoms par zhugs bzhin du lam du gshegs so/ / yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sku'i gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sa lam der zhugs te/ de na sems can gang dag tshangs pa la dang cid
239b7: rangs pas 'dul ba de dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i gzugs su lam nas gshegs par mthong ba nas gang dag brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i bar dang / gang dag sred med kyi bus 'dral ba dang / gang dag
239b8: dbang phyug chen pos 'dul ba dang / gang dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag 'khor los bsgyur bas 'dul ba dang / gang dag khams kyi rgyal phran gyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag rdzu 'phrul chen pos

240a1: 'dul ba dang gang dag dge sbyong gis 'dul ba dang / gang dag gzhon nus 'dul ba dang / gang dag bud med kyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag seng ges 'dul ba dang / gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba dang / gang dag klus
240a2: 'dul ba dang / gang dag lha ma yin gyis 'dul nas// gang dag ri bong la dad cing gi 'dul ba'i ba de dgagig bcom ldan 'das ri bong gis gzugs dang / rtags dang spyod lam gyis lam nas gshegs par mthong ngo // sems
240a3: can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyi sa lam nas gshegs par mthong ste/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas
240a4: mngon par bstod cing phyag 'tshal te/ zhabs 'bring du 'brang zhing dong ngo // yang de'i tshe gangs kyi ri dang nye ba na gnas pa drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bdud sdig can gyis btang nas/ de g.yog lnga brgya dang rgyal po'i
240a5: khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo'i drung na sdod pas bcom ldan 'das drang song gi gzugs dang / rtags dang kha dog dang dbyibs dang / spyod lam dang / bkod pa de lta bus lam nas gshegs shing lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
240a6: mang po mchod pa byed par brtson par mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang de 'di skad du sems so// bden par 'di ni drang srong chen po mthu che zhing mchod par 'os pa ste/ lha dang mis mchod par snang ngo // 'di'i lus thams cad kyang
240a7: bsod nams kyi mtshan gyis brgyan te/ mkhas shing slob dpon yin par shes so// bdag cag gnyis gang rgan/ gang mkhas pa de la ngas ji ltar brtag snyam ste/ de nas yang 'di ltar bdag gis mdun bsul/
240a8: 'di la rigs dang / rus dang / gnas dang / brtul zhugs kun dri'o snyam du sems so// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bdag gi 'khor la bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so// thos ldan yid 'thad

240b1: brtul thugs che 'dzin mchod pa'i rigs par snang / ye shes chos don ldan zhing thub mchog bzod 'di lam rab mkhyen// khyed cag thams cad 'di la gus par mchod chen yang dag sbyor/ yon tan ldan pa 'di las
240b2: 'khor mthar 'gro ba'i legs bshad mnyan/ / de nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag thams cad kyis/ 'grin gcig tu mkhan po de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras so// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas g.yog dang bca
240b3: pa bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// khyed su zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ni bram ze'o// gsol
240b4: pa/ gdung rus ci/ bka' stsal pa nga'i rus ni go'u ta ma'o// gsol pa khyod kyi brtul zhugs ci/ bka' stsal pa/ nga'i brtul zhugs ni rnam par thar pa gsum mo// gsol pa/ khyod kyi spyod pa ci// bka' stsal
240b5: pa/ da ni yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin nyid la spyod do// gsol pa// khyod rab tu byung nas ji srid lon bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa byung nas ji srid len par rab tu byung nas kyang de srid lon no// gsol pa/ drang srong chen po skar ma
240b6: bshad pa lung bstan pa'i rig pa gsung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sgro btags pa med par mnyam pa nyid du'o// 'di ni 'jig rten gyi shes pa ste de la snying po ci zhig yod/ drang srong gis gsol pa/ mkhas
240b7: pa rnams dag yar bgyid pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar ma'i gnas gang yin// drang srong gis gsol ba/ gang zla ba dang / nyi ma la brten cing rjes su rku ba'i rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad brjod pa 'di dag go// del
240b8: 'dzub ni sor brgyad kyi tshad de/ 'dzub de'i tshad kyis lus la srid du 'dzub bcu gnyis par rig par bgyi'o// glad pa'i spyi bo la 'dzub gang dang / rkang pa'i mthil la 'dzub gang ste/ 'dzub bcu bzhi ni skar ma rnams kyi gnas so//

241a1: gang de dag na gda' ba ni rnam pa gzhan bu mi 'gyur te/ skar ma gang la btsas pa de dang de dag na gda'o// yang gang zhe na/ de bshad par bgyi yis thub pa chen po gson cig/ smin drug la ni su btsas pa/ de yi gdong
241a2: gi sor bzhi/ / g.yas phyogs na ni sme ba mchis// spu can ga nag la mdog kyang dmar/ longs spyod bdog cing grags dang ldan// mkhas shing rab tu dpal 'bar te/ smin drug la ni skyes pa'i/ mtshan ma nyid ni de lags so//
241a3: gang zhig la ni sor bzhin/ sme ba 'di nyid gda' ba de// snar ma la ni skyes pa ste/ shes shing rtag tu chos la dga'/ mkhas la longs spyod phun sum tshogs// rnam pa kun du mdzes dang ldan// dpa' zhi nga rgyal ba phun sum tshogs// /
241a4: dgra rnams rtag par rab tu 'joms// mgul ba'i ni 'dzub byed na// gang la tshig pa 'dra gda' ba// de ni mgo la skyes pa ste/ dpa' zhing longs spyod ldan pa'o// 'dzub kyi phyed po gnyis pa la/ g.yon pa spro ba gang mchis pa/
241a5: lag pa skyes pa khro ba ste/ de ni blun zhing longs spyod bdog/ mtshan khud g.yon na sme nag mchis// nab sol ni skyes pa ste/ nor dang 'bru rnams 'byor par 'gyur// de ni shes pa'i rgya yang chung // ji ltar khyod ni rgyal las skyes//
241a6: mtshan mchog dag ni rab tu gda'/ phyag gi mthil na 'khor lo ni/ nyi ma lta bur rab tu mangs// dbu spu dag ni thams cad kyang // gyen du g.yas 'khyil legs par mchis// sku ni chu zhe dgab pa ste/ 'dren pa khyed kyis nyon mongs
241a7: thul/ / tshig 'dra gang gi snying ka mchis// skag la skyes te thab mo sred/ tshul khrims 'chal zhing 'grogs mi bde// de ni g.ye ma la dga' ba'o// 'og gam brang ngam rgyab cig na// gang la byi sran 'dra ba ga dang / mchu las skyes te
241a8: nor dang ldan/ / btsun zhing ches dang ldan pa'i mi/ lto ba g.yas g.yos gnyis ga na// gang la rma 'dra gda' ba ni// de ni gre la skyes pa ste// ser sna che zhing che yang thung // lte ba man chad sor bzhin// gang la sme ba rab gda' ba// srol de

241b1: skyes longs spyod can/ / khrims ldan shi 'phos mtho ris mche// me bzhi la ni skyes pa dag/ sle ba dmar po chu so gdang // rku zheng g.yo can sgyu ma ste// bsod nams chung zhing shes bzhan// gang gi mtshan la sme ba ni// gda' bar byur ba
241b2: ngas par yang/ nag pa la ni skyes pa ste// 'dod chags glu gar dag tu dga'// mtshan gyi 'og gam stang na ni// sme ba sar po rab tu gda'// sa ri la ni de smras te/ maM mkhas brkam zhing mang po snang// brla gnyis kyi ni 'dzub ga
241b3: na/ sle ba dmar po de bzhin te// sa ga la ste shor ba mchog/ skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bskor// mkhas shid dpa' la dgra yang thul// rtag tu bde la gnas pa ste// ngo tsha shes shing brtan dang ldan// shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris skye/ brla
241b4: gnyis kyi ni 'dzub don gang la byi sran 'dra ba gdang / / lha mtshams la te tshul khrims can// chos dang longs spyod ldan pa'o// gang gi bskod ga gnyis na ni// sme ba gda' bsngon la skyes// me sdug tshe thung tshul khrims 'tshal/
241b5: dbul zhing snying rje ma mchis so// pu sa mo gnyis ka'i god na ni// gang la rma chung gda' ba ste/ snrums la skyes te dbang thar can// myur du bdag bye ma zhig par ba byed/ chu stong la ni skyes pa dag/ smra ba pus mo'i lha ngan sbyin pa bgyid
241b6: bid chos lam 'tshal/ shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris ma chi// chu smad la ni su skyes ma// gru do la ni sme ba mchis// de ltar gda' ba shes dang ldan// longs spyod ldan zhing sems can byams// sme ba gnyis po gda' ba ni// gro zhi ni la ste
241b7: longs spyod rtag/ de bzhin nad med sems can byams// 'pho sa nas ni mtho ris mchi/ sme banag po rje dar la// gda' ba mon gru skyes pa ste/ de ni khro zhing 'dod chags chung / longs spyod ma mchis shes rab ldan// rje dang
241b8: la ni 'dzub don/ sme ba nag po rab tu gda' // mo ni grelas skyes blun po ste// de ni chu yis 'chi bar 'gyur// rje ngar 'og gi 'dzub gang na// rma 'dra mchis pa khrums stong la// blun zhing gzhan la gnod pa bgyid// de ni dbul zhing

242a1: rkun po bgyid/ gang la sme ba 'dzub gang na// khrums smad la ni skyes pa ste/ sbyin dang tshul khrims dran pa dang / shes rab 'jigs med snying rjer ldan/ gang gi rkang pa gnyis ga la// sme ba phra mo gda' ba ni/ nam
242a2: gru skyes pa ma rabs te/ 'dreg mkhan du yang 'gyur ba lags// gang gi mthe bo'i phrag na yang / sme ba sngon po gda' ba ni// rtag tu stobs ldan nang ma mchis// tha skar la ni de skyes so// rkang mthil sme ba mchis pa ni/
242a3: za nye la ste snying brtse med// gsod pa'i gshed ma'i ngang tshul can/ shi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar mchi/ gang gis spyod pa 'tshal ba'i// skar ma'i gnas ni 'di dag lags// 'jig rnam ni rnam shes 'dis// sems
242a4: can rnams ni pha rol 'dren/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun du rtog pa'i spyod yul can/ byis pa gang la chags 'dug pa/ de ni byis pa rmongs pa ste// sems la gnas shing rims nad bcas//
242a5: khyi dang sbrul dang rus sbal dang / srog chags gzhan yang rnam mang po// skar ma rgyal la gang skyes pa/ de dag bde la bsten ma yin/ ji ltar bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dang / thar pa khyod kyis rnyed pa bzhin// nga yang thams
242a6: cad gzigs pa na/ / ci phyir ngal khyod mi 'dri/ de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor nas yid rab tu dga' ste 'di skad ces gsol to// drang srong mi'i gzugs su ni// mtshan mchog
242a7: rnams kang shin du gda'/ / khyod kyi gdung rus ma 'tshal na/ lha'am 'on te khyod mi lags// gsung dang dbyangs rag 'byin pa ni/ tshangs pa chen po bzhin du gda'/ spyod pa'i gnas kyang tshul gyis ni/ sngon gyi drang srong rnams dang
242a8: 'dra/ / thub pa ci 'dra phun sum mtshogs// 'di sngon ma mthong ma thos na/ khyod kyi ston gang de ci smra// khyod kyi gdung rus ci lags gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pha rol tshun rol mi shes shing // mtshan

242b1: mal ni gang gnas pa/ de dag sdug bsngal kun gyis bcing de ni thar pa'i snod ma yin/ pha rol byin drug nga'i dus/ bram ze mngon shes drug dang ldan/ yang dag dga' ba drug smra zhing / dbang po//
242b2: drug ni rnam par bshig/ chos gsum rtogs pa'i shes dang ldan/ nga'i spyod pa rnam thar gsum/ byang chub sems ni nam skyes pa/ de tshe nga ni rab du byung / mtshan ma rnams ni ngas ma dmigs// mtshan ma med pa
242b3: rab tu bsgoms/ sems can med can med cing srog med pa/ bdag med stong par mngon sangs rgyas/ tshor ba gsum dang 'du snyed gsum/ stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgoms/ da ni ye shes pha rol song / nga'i tshig
242b4: 'di gsungs pa med/ gang dag mkha' bzhin ma chags par/ byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed pa/ de dag gzod stobs phun sum tshogs/ ye shes 'di 'dra thob par 'gyur/ chos rnams la ni mi 'jug cing
242b5: rnam par smin pa 'dod med la/ de bzhin nyid las 'gal mi byed// de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ chos rnams la ni ma gnas shing / pha rol tshul rol mi rten par/ yang dag mthar ni 'dir bsgoms na// de bzhin gshegs
242b6: pa nyid du 'gyur/ mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma'ang med/ dmigs pa de ni rnam par spangs/ chos rnams kun dang ma 'dres na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/ rang gi mtshan nyid 'dir 'od la/ rang gi sems
242b7: la the tsom spongs/ nam mkha' 'dra bar shes nas su/ nga 'dra sangs rgyas khyod 'gyur byes/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gi sungs ma thag tu de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba
242b8: g.yog dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang rtags dang spyod lam du zhugs par mthong nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon du gyur to/ / de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas ting

243a1: 'dzin gang thob na byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo bzhin du 'dug nas ting nge 'dzin thams cad la lta zhing gzhan la rag las pa med de/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par
243a2: 'gyur ba/ / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che tog ces bya ba thob po// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas lag pa gnyis na me tog thogs te/ bcom ldan
243a3: 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / yon tan mtha' yas 'jig rten mgon po bden pa gsung ba legs bzhugs pa khyed kyi ye shes spyan gyi 'od zer gyis ni 'jig rten kun snang
243a4: mdza/ / rtag tu sems can kun gyi slad du dpa' bo byams pas mngon 'phags pa// sems can snying po chags pa zad pa 'dren pa khyod la deng phyag 'tshal// gser gyi kha dog gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer rnams
243a5: kyis bsil gyur pa'i/ / yon tan dag gis sems can thams cad byang chub rgyar 'gyur rab tu bskul// khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba nyon mongs ri rnams bcom par gyur/ tha ma'i spyod pa
243a6: byang chub shes pa'i rgyu ni de ri mthar phyin to/ / sman pa chen po sems can snying pa mtshan rnams kyis ni rab brgyan pa// sems can snying po sangs rgyas 'gyur ba 'dren pa de ring bshad du gsol// bdag gis
243a7: zla ba'i rgya mtsho bcad cing grol nas 'gro ba bsgral bar bgyi/ ji srid kyis ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba mi'i dam pa lung bstan gsol// sdug bsngal chu bo 'das pa'i sems can srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar
243a8: bgyi/ / mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba zag pa med pa'i lam la dgod par bgyi/ phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang rnams yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu dag/ de dag bdag gis dbang du gsol te byang chub tu ni sems gzhol//

243b1: gyes/ drag cing mi bzad rtsub pa'i sdug bsngal dag gis rig pa'i sems can kun/ dus gsum gyi ni bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bsod nams des// sems can thams cad sdug bsngal de ring
243b2: zhi bar gyur cig sems can kun/ / sangs rgyas kyi ni bde dang ldan zhing rtag tu mya ngan 'das par shog/ sems can thams cad nad zhir gyur cig nyon mongs chu yang skams par shog/ ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes dbang
243b3: po'i snying po ldan pa thob gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gsad par chad cing sdug bsngal dag gis gtses pa rnams// de dag bdag gi bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis myur du thar bar shog/ sems can re
243b4: res kyang ni yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad thob gyur cig/ shes rab bsod nams tshad med pa dang bde ba kun gyis tshim par shog// de dag sdig pa'i rnam spangs lta ba mnyam nyid myur du bsten gyur cig/ sems can
243b5: thams cad skye ba dran cing chos la spyod pa nyid du shog/ sems can da kun chos grus srid pa'i rgya mtsho pha rol rgal gyur cig/ thams cad chos kyi pha rol phyin pa sangs rgyas su yang grub par shog/ bskal pa dpag
243b6: tu med par chos kyi char pa 'bebs shing 'dug gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi sprin gyi char chus legs par 'khru bar shog/ bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nongs pa chud zad ci bgyis pa/ sangs
243b7: rgyas thams cad dbang du gsol te gum par bgyis nas so sor bshags/ / bdag kyang phyin chad sdig la lta ba'i las rnams spyod par ma gyur cig/ rtag tu mdun na bsam gyis mi kha ba gang zag mchog bzhugs
243b8: mthong bar shog/ bdag gi bsod nams chud zad ci mchis deng de byang chub bsngo bar bgyi// sems can ched du spyod pa kun dang bsdug bsngal thams cad spro bar bgyi// sems can thams cad byang chub mchog gi/

244a1: lam du rab tu gzung bar bgyi/ bskal par zhing dang ye shes sems can rgya mtsho rnam par spyad par bgyi// gang du byang chub reg par 'gyur zhing rnam par dag pa thob par bgyi// 'khor kun rnam par dag cing
244a2: bzod pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par shog/ smra ba'i seng ge nges par mngon par shes pa lnga rnams thob par shog/ 'dren pa chags med ye shes ldan zhing thams cad gzigs pa lung bstan gsol// 'jig rten du yang
244a3: sangs rgyas chos kun kha le bsgyur bar 'gyur zhe na/ / me tog sil ma gtor ba nam mkha' la ni gdugs su gnas par shog/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi rnams lhags pa kun kyang dpar gyis shig/ sa rnams g.yo bar byed
244a4: cing khyod kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal shog/ de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la bde'i steng logs su gtor ba dang / me tog de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
244a5: gtsug gi steng du gdugs gcig tu gyur nas 'dug ste/ drang srong skar ma la dga' bas de mthong nas rab tu zang zing med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang yid bde bas tshim par byed par gyur te/ de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa
244a6: la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so// drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i stod gsum gyi stong chen po'i
244a7: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grang med dpag tu med pa gang dag der lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang yid skyo zhing bltad mor gyur to// gang dag glang po ches 'dul
244a8: pa'i sems can de dag gis ni bde bar gshegs pa glang po che'i gzugs su mthong nas yid dga' bar gyur cing drang srong chen pos me tog gtor ba de dag steng gi bar snang la gdugs su gyur te gnas pa dang / sa g.yos

244b1: bde yang mthong nas rab tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so// gang dag yang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du
244b2: mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par mthong nas zang zing
244b3: med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / spos dang phred pa dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / byad 'phrul dang / rgyan ji snyed pa dag gis gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
244b4: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / drang srong chen po myur du longs la nyon/ byang chub lung bstan zhes ni 'dren pa gsung // mnyam pa med pa'i mthus ni sa g.yos shing // nam mkha' la yang me tog gdugs gcig
244b5: bdug/ khyod ni 'jig rten phan phyir ston dbang po// rkang gnyis bdag gi btso bo sangs rgyas su// bsod nams mtha' yas nam mkha' tshad mnyam pa// khams gsum snying po 'gro ba'i sgron mar gyur// de nas byang chub sems
244b6: dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gang du bdag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ci 'dra bar 'gyur bcom ldan 'das kyis
244b7: bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa na/ byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog rgyas pa'i dri zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni ji ltar da ltar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can
244b8: bzhin du bkod pa de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

245a1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
245a2: bcom ldan 'das rdul med spos snang skar ma'i dpal zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ / khyod kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar kyi bskal pa bcu thub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing / byang chub
245a3: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gi gnas su 'gyur te/ khyod kyang de na theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig ston par 'gyur ro// 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems daH/
245a4: chen po skad ma la dga' ba'i lung bstan pa de thos nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i las la mngon par brtson par gyur to// bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
245a5: phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi sems dpa' zhes bya ba thob bo//
245a6: 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ drang srong skad ma la dga' ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // bam po lnga pa// de nas bdud dbye ba dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar grong khyer 'di'i phyi rol lha dang / klu
245a7: dang / gnod sbyin dag gis brgyan pa de bzhin du bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer 'di'i sgo gang dang gang nas gshegs pa de'i sgo de dang de'i sa phyogs bkod pa'i rgyan dam pa khyad par du 'phags
245a8: pas brgyan to snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdu dbye ba de dag gi sems kyi kun tu rtog pa mkhyen nas/ 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de/ 'di lta bu'i

245b1: rdu phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas/ grong khyer gyi sgo bcu gnyis su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis grong khyer gyi sgor re nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs so// bdud
245b2: bye ba de dag kyang nam mkha' la gnas gzhin du bdud kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan shin du khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul grangs med pa dang ldan pa/ bkod pa'i mchog rnams dang / bkod pa mdzes
245b3: pa rnams kyis grong khyer gyi sgo de dag dang / sa'i phyogs de dag dang / rtsig pa de dag dang / shing de dag dang / sa'i ngos de dag brgyan to// bdud dbye ba de dag dang / bdud kyi 'khor de dag la la ni tshangs pa'i cha byad lta bu
245b4: nas drang srong chen po'i cha byad lta bu'i bar du bsgyur te nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi skar khung dang / rta babs dang / ba ga ma dang / bskyed shing gi nang du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos
245b5: dang zer ba dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig sna tshogs kyis spras pa dang / gos dang / ngas dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyan rnams kyi tshar ni rab tu phab// sel snyan dang / dkrol
245b6: babasna tshogs ni dkrol nas bstod pa dang / yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs kyi dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chen po sngon ma thos pa'i bkod pa mchog tu
245b7: chache ba/ khyad par du 'phags pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgon bzhugs te// zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bos sgo'i them pa la reg par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa la reg ma thag tu/ de nas
245b8: de'i mod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos so/ / gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba

246a1: dpa 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / sa dang / chu dang / rgya mtsho chen
246a2: po dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor gyi lha dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / lha'i drang srong chen po'i 'khor dang / 'og min gyi bar nas bzung ste/ sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams
