246a3: cad sa g.yos par snang ba des bskul ma thag tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po khor khor yug tu bskor nas sa dang nam mkha' la gnas shing me tog dang / spos dus kyi rjes su 'brad pa'i phye ma'i bar gyis bcom ldan
246a4: 'das la gtor to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me tog dang / phye ma'i bar de dag phyogs bcu'i phyogs kyi cha re re na yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs
246a5: su ma dag pa dang stong pa dang / mi stong pa rnams sa sangs rgyas la mchod cing sti stang bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' la gtor ba dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu me tog dang / phye ma dang / rgyan de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung
246a6: po myur du sad par gyis la 'di dag bltos/ / byang chub phyir ni bag yod spyad pa spyod// khyed kyis 'khor ba'i gcod rong 'khyams pa yi// 'jig rten thams cad dag ni bsgral bar byos// yongs su smin dang ldan pa'i
246a7: dus bab gyis/ / g.yeng bar gyur pa rab tu myur thod la// 'dir ni sngon gyi dam bcas yid la byos// byang chub lung bstan rab tu thob par 'gyur// thub dbang drang srong chen pos mya ngan med// 'gro la phan phyir de ring grong khyer
246a8: gshegs/ / bdud stong bye ba rang gi sa pham mdzad de// de ni chos kyi 'khor lo myur du bskor// grogs po zhi ba 'di la 'gro dga' mdzad// dpa' mchog dngos po yang dag ston par mdzad// 'gro ba bsngal bsngal dag las

246b1: thar mdzad nas/ / byang chub tu ni de ring lung yang ston// rang byud mya ngan med pa grong khyer gshegs// de phyir zhing der rab tu skung gshegs la/ de ltar mdzes pa de dag rab bltos te// rim gyis byang chub tu yang 'gyur bar byos//
246b2: ya de'i tshe 'od ma'i tshal na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos dang / nyan thos chen po gang dag nang du yang dag par 'jog la gnas pa de dag gis ston pa de la bltas pa dang / bcom
246b3: ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na 'dul ba la gzhes shing bzhugs pa mthong ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi snam
246b4: logs su 'khod pa dang / bkod pa chen po de dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas me tog dang / phye ma'i rgyan de dag las tshigs su gcad pa'i sgra gang byung ba de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
246b5: yongs su ma dag pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad thams cad du gang par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos
246b6: gang dag gnas pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu/ ro myang bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ dga' bar bya bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ tshim par byed par 'os pa 'di lta bu/ spro bar byed pa 'di
246b7: lta bu'i/ yon tan chen po brjod par 'os pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di dag dang / me tog dang / phye ma'i char 'di dag gi las 'ongs snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de dag dang / nyan thos chen po
246b8: de dag rang gi dge ba'i phyogs btang ste ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

247a1: snyoms par zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyan dang lhab grub kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
247a2: dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bkod pa chen po 'di lta bu dag snang ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag
247a3: cing rdul bsags pa med ces bya ba yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di 'dra ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ rtsig pa med la legs par brgyan pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul
247a4: phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du yang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na/ shin du lham me lhan ne g+ha de bzhugs par snang ba ni ma gtogs so// sangs rgyas
247a5: kyi zhing de dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag sgra thos pa des bskul ba dang / phyogs bzhir blta zhing 'khod de// dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ha cang yang
247a6: mi ring ban 'dug par mthong ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan de dag thams cad kyang mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag
247a7: 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag blta ba dang / brtag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la yang blta ba
247a8: dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir der dong ngo // der ni bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig

247b1: rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i rdzu
247b2: 'phrul gyi mthus rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas mi snang bar gyur te/ skad cig thad cig yud tsam de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin to// de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'
247b3: sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa dpag tu med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams kyang 'dir lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dis thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i bar ma lus par gang bar gyur/
247b4: to/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par
247b5: gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad me tog sna tshogs kyi char gyis khebs par byas so// la la dag gi
247b6: ni mu tig gi char phab pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang shel dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / go shi ra sha dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying
247b7: po dang / shing rta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma'i char gyis nam mkha' khebs par byas so// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni lhab lbub dang / phyang 'phrul dang / rgyan dang / ras dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs
247b8: kyi char rab tu phab po/ / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs bsgred do// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni

248a1: spos sna tshogs kyis 'dugs so/ / la la dag gis ni rin po che'i phreng ba sna tshogs gtor to// la la dag gis ni sil snyan dang dkrol ba sna tshogs dkros to// la la dag gis ni klu dang gar dang /
248a2: rol mo'i sgra rab tu bstan to// la la dag gis ni sa phyogs der spos chu sna tshogs kyi char gyis chag chag btab po// la la dag gis ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod rnams rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
248a3: sngan thogs so/ / la la dag gis ni rin po che'i snod sna tshogs rnams spos chus bkang ste me tog dang 'bras bu dang / lo mas brgyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan thogs so// la la dag gis ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshom
248a4: lha'i gos dang / rgyan dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas 'phang bstod de thogs so// la la dag gis ni bdag nyid tshangs pa chen po'i cha byad du mngon par sprul te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas
248a5: te/ 'khod pa nas rgya cher ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin no// la la dag ni seng ge'i cha byad du mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs
248a6: bskyed pas sems can de dag phan tshun mig gi dbang pos gzugs snang ba rnams la thags thogs med do/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang de lta bu'i bdud kyi yul chen po lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs rnams
248a7: dang / rang gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang dbang po dang / stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i
248a8: byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs nas srang gi dbus na pad ma yod pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil gyis pad ma'i snying po la reg par mdzad de dngas

248b1: nas bzhugs so/ / pad ma de drangs te g.yos pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i ri khor yug dang / ri khor yug chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ra re ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang g.yos so// bdud kyi gnas/
248b2: thams cad na gzhal med khang dang / gnas dang / mal cha dang / stan rnams kyang rab tu g.yos so// de na gang bdud kyi bu rnams dang / bdud kyi bu mo rnams dang / bdud kyi tshogs kyi 'khor gnas pa de dag kyang 'jigs skrag cing skyo ba skyes nas
248b3: pan tshun 'di skad 'dzer to/ / rgyu med rkyen med par ni gzhal med khang 'di dag g.yo bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag cag gi rgyal po bdud de rang gi yul nas 'phos par ma gyur grang bdag cag kyang khang pa 'di nas 'chi 'pho ba'i chos
248b4: 'byung bar mi 'gyur grang / bdag cag gis blta gor ma chag go snyam ste/ de nas de dag gis mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni snyigs ma lnga can du gyur na 'di sus legs par brgyan cing shin//
248b5: tunyams dga' bar byas snyam mo// de nas rang gi yul la gnas pa'i bdud g.yog dang bcas pa de dag de na 'khor bzhin du yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis
248b6: legs par brgyan cing shin du lham me lhan ne ltang der bzhugs pa mthong ngo / / thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang sems can gzugs/
248b7: dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs sna tshogs su gnas pa sha stag gis yongs su gang nas/ sems can gcig kyang ngo mi shes te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson
248b8: par mthong ngo / / de nas de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bdag cag gi jo bo dang / g.yog du bcas pa gar dong ba yang dri ba'i phyir der 'dod

249a1: gar mchog snyam mo/ / de nas yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas spyan
249a2: sngar 'khod do/ / de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// rab tu rnam par dang sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ bdag
249a3: khrol 'di nas myur du thong / chos ni yang dag spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba yang // ngas ni su la'ang bzlog pa med// gal te lam ni rab shes na// gang du dga' bar 'gro bar bya/
249a4: 'dud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rang gi spyod yul gar dga' bar gang tshe bdag ni mchi 'tshal te// bdag ni bcings pa lnga dag gis// bcings par mthong ngo gau tam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
249a5: nga ni rtog pa kun spangs te// grol nas 'gro ba grol byed pa// des ni 'tshe ba rnam spangs nas// sems can bcings pa thar bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad
249a6: sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang ba la gzigs nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / 'dir lhags pa dag thams cad kyang the tsom thams cad rab spongs la/
249a7: sad cig ci yang ma smra bar// khyed cag rnams ner nyon cig/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dkon// chos dang dge 'dun shin du dkon// dang cing mos pa 'byor pa dang / byang chub spyod pa shin du dkon// 'jig rten
249a8: mgon po'i mngon sum du/ / chos nyan pa yang shin du dkon// gang du bzod pa bstan byed pa// de yi dus ni rnyed par dka'// gang du 'jig rten sdig pa yi// rtog pa thams cad rab spong ba// stong pa nyid ni bsgom pa dang

249b1: sems ni dul bar byed pa dkon/ / ji ltar ngas ni sngon spyad pa'i// byang chub spyod pa rnyed par dka'// de las me tog tsha mchod 'di// khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya// gang gis byang chub 'byor byed pa// srid pa'i bcings la/
249b2: rab krol zhing // mun pa'i phung po sel ba yi// lam gyi mchog ni bstan par bya// dri ma ngan pa gsum spongs la// ston pas gsungs pa 'dir nyon cig/ chu bo rnams kyi pha rol rgol/ rgya mo can gyi sred pa spongs//
249b3: rnamathar gsum la rab gnas shing // sdom pa gsum la yang dag gnas// khams gsum kun gyi nyon mongs gang // de dag ma lus rnam par chon/ kon mchog gsum gyi rigs mchog dang // chos kyi do/
249b4: du khyed cag rnams// sangs rgyas lha dang bdud gsum gyi// byin rlabs sprul pas lhags pa rnams// dus gsum ma rig bsgribs pa'i sems// bye brag du ni rab tu spongs// khams gsum pa las grol ba'i/ zhi byed
249b5: bzod par thob par byos/ phyin ci log ni rnam bzhi yis// so so'i skye bo bslad pa rnams// dngos po meng la rtog byed pa// de dag bzod pa'i snod ma yin// mig ni gzugs la chags pa yis// lus dang ngag dang sems
249b6: bsgribs nas/ / bsam gtan bzhi dang bral ba rnams// 'khor ba shin du bstan par 'gyur// 'jig rten na ni gang mkhas gsal// bsam gtan bsgom par byed pa rnams/ de dag phyin ci log bzhi las// de ri
249b7: rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ / dbang phyug de dag sems can rnams// chu bo bzhi las thar bar byed// 'che 'bo skye bar ba shes pa// nges pa rnams ni pha rol 'gro// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa// rkang pa bzhi
249b8: dang ldan pa dag/ sems can sred pas bcings pa rnams yang dag shes pas gcod par byed// phung po lnga rnams yongs shes pas// nags pa las grol zag pa med// yang dang yang du mi skye ste/ srid pa'i rgya

250a1: mtsho'i pha rol byin/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar khyed/ sdig pa dag ni myur du bshags// sdig pa ma lus rab spongs la 'jigs pa med par pha rol song // srid par yang dang yang skyes pas// sI/
250a2: pa'i grogs kyi dbang sa bas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de dag ni// 'dus byas la yang myong bar 'gyur/ sdig pa'i grogs po rab spongs te/ sdig pa'i lta ba rnams bor nas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
250a3: dran byas te/ dam pa'i chos la rab sbyor cig/ btung ba'i dam pa 'thung bar byos/ stong pa nyid kyang rab bsgoms shig/ dam pa'i don la dngos po med/ rdzas kyang med cing mtshan nyid med// 'di ltar dbang po
250a4: drug stong ste/ byed pa po ni 'di la med/ de bzhin mtshan mar rtog pa yang // dngos po tsam g.yo ba med/ tshor ba drug dang sred pa drug/ reg pa drug las byung ba yin/ de bzhin reg pa'i skye mched drug/
250a5: stong pa yin par shes par byos/ rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med par// dngos po nyid la rtag par byos// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pas/ 'di na rdzas kyang med par ltos// gang gis chos kun tshul
250a6: gcig ste/ dus gsum du yang dngos med par/ shes pa de dag nad med de/ de ni bla na med pa'i lam/ rnam pa bcu gsum des grol la// sems can 'du shes rnam 'jig cing // tshul rol pha rol rnam grol ba// de ni bzod
250a7: pabasgom pa yin/ / de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod nams kyi stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa'i shugs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra thogs pa med
250a8: bas tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs pa de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong pa dang / mi stong pa'i snyings ma lnga can gang gA'i klung dpag tu med pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bye ma snyed rnams rnams sa dbyangs kyi dkyis

250b1: 'khor gyi tshig/ / brjod pa 'di dag grag par gyur nas de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing der nas kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni shin tu zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / dang brnyed de/ than med
250b2: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / la la dag gis ni ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus par sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams
250b3: kyis ni don dang tshig dang / yi ge 'di dag thos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to// sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni theg pa gsum po dag gis nges par 'byung ba thob par gyur// nas byang chub sems dpa'
250b4: sems dpa' chen po skang ma la dga' bas pa da ma'i khril 'dzeg par bya ba'i phyir rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus rin po che sna bdun gyi thamaskas me tog gis kun tu g.yogs pa mngon par sprul ste/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su
250b5: thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / thams cad mkhyen pa rga shi mya ngan gyi// 'dam du bying ba'i 'jig rten thams cad la/ rab tu gzigs te mi rgyu chur bcas te// 'jig rten du ni chos kyi zam pa thogs// thal mo
250b6: sbyar ba'i sems can rgya chen brgyas/ / rab tu bltam pa'i zhing la gzigs nas su// chos kyi mchod sbyin rab tu bgo bar gsol/ rang gi mthu rtsal rab tu bstan du gsol/ mtshungs pa'i med pa'i pad ma mngon 'dzegs te/
250b7: mgon po shes rab dang ni thabs rnams kyis/ chos chu sprin gyis char pa rab po ba la/ nyon mongs gzir ba'i me la bstan du gsol/ phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad dang / drad song chen po shes rab ldanapa
250b8: gzhan myod kyi dbang du de dag kun bzhugs kyis/ thub pa'i dbang po bdud rnams pham par mdzod/ chos rnams stong pa nam mkha' lta bu dang / ngo bo nyid kyi sa ya ma brlar mkhyen nas/ sngon gyi dam bcas rnams ni dgongs

251a1: mdzo la bla med 'khor lo dam pa bskor dra gsol/ / chu bo bzhi dbus 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// mi'i seng ge de ring bsngal du gsol// khyod kyis chos rnams shin du thugs su rung/ srid gsum mtsho las 'jig
251a2: rten bsgral du gsol/ / shin du rlabs chen thugs mnga' bcom ldan 'das// bde bar gshegs kyi la man bde ba la// 'gro ba gzung 'dod mtshungs mad chos kyang bston/ 'jig rten nyes pa dri ma bsal du gsol// de nas
251a3: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur sprul pa'i themaskas de las pad ma'i khril mngon par 'dzegs te/ pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu thams cad du rnam par gzigs nas
251a4: bdud sdig can la bka' bstsal pa/ bdud sdig can ji ltar khyod kyi rkyen gyis deng 'dir 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pas sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag mngal na gnas pa dang / rga shis gtses
251a5: pa rnams las rnam par 'grol bar 'gyur rnam par thar par 'gyur ro/ / chu bo bzhi las yang dag par rgal bar 'gyur/ zhi ba'i lam la gnas par 'gyur/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur te/ 'di
251a6: la sdig can khyod ni sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i thog mar 'gro ba yin gyis khyod dga' bar gyis shig/ sdig can khyod kyis ngal chos bshad par gsol cig dang ras deng bdud kyi dkyil 'khor
251a7: mngon po'i yul gyi chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ / de nas bdud sngag can gyis de'i tsho tshig su bcad pa 'di smras so// ci ste sdig med khyod la thab zhe sdang rgyags med na/ ci phyir dang 'dir kun du skrag par
251a8: byaphyir chos kyang stod/ / daste khyod la thab rgyagasad dang rgyal yod na ni/ thub dbang khyod kyi thar ba ci 'dra ba dag la 'di shod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga na sa la mngal gyi gnas na zlab bcur gnas pa/ de na

251b1: yang ni bdud khyod ngal bsad par rab tu sbyar/ / de tsheng la khon dang thab cung zad tsam yang med// da ni bzod dang ldan te thab ma lus med pa yin// nga ni btsas ma thag 'dir khyod kyis sa yang g.yo bar byas// ngags
251b2: phyir ni rdo ba'i char ba rab tu dbab par byas/ de nas khyod kyis nga'i ma'i nu zho myur skems byas// khyod kyis ngal gnod pa rnam pa du ma cim byas// ngani bsam gtad lugs tshe khyod kyis bud med khrid de 'ongs// nga ni bsod snyom/
251b3: rnam par spyod che zas kyang gcad par byas/ khyod kyis rtag tung la rgyal srid mngon par rab tu bstabs// da ni 'byung ba'i nub mo 'dir yang mun pa byas par gyur// de tshe khyod dang skyes bu rnams kyis grong khyer kun du bska
251b4: rdzu 'phrul gyis ni song tshe rdzing char drag par rab tu phab/ / sa ni mdom do 'phang tsam rdo ba dag gis gang bar byas zhi ba'i gnas na gnas pa'i tshe yang sgra ni rab tu phyung / nga ni shin du dka' ba sprod tshe grang ba'i rlung dang ni/
251b5: 'bab chu 'gram na gnas tshe khyod kyis chu bo rab tu btang // da ni bsad par bya phyir khyod kyis seng ge rab tu btang / de tshe khyod kyis nga'i zas la drag po'i dug kyang btab// nga ni byang chub shing drung nye bar yang dag sod ba na/
251b6: rdo rje dang ni gnas lcags su gri mda' char khyod kyis pab/ 'gro la ban phyir rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par gnas pa na/ khyod kyis drar smrig gos kyang 'jim rdza ba dag gis rab tu bsdus// de na yang ni ngagan khyod kyis
251b7: bu mo rnams bkye ste/ / ngags dbyin ni khyod nying mthu dang bcas te 'ongs mod kyi// 'on kyang khyod kyis nga'i yid la gnod byas cung zad med// ngas ni khyod btul nas su byang chub mtshungs pa med pa thob// 'on kyang
251b8: bor ste 'dir 'ongs nas ni yang smra 'am/ sdig pa'i tshul gyis 'od srung mchog la sogs pa bzlog byas te// khyod kyis sems can bye du ma ma rung byas nas kyang / snying rje bor te 'dir yang nga la rgal zhing smra byed

252a1: dam/ nga yis zas ma zos pa de yi tshe yang khyod kyis su// nga bsad phyir ni glang chen myos pa drag shul can yang btang // sa ste ngal lhas sbyin gyis ni rdo ba 'phangs pa dang // kye mangs ni zla ba gsum du
252a2: ta chas zos pa dang / / phya ra ka gtang phyir bu mo mdzes ldan rab du gang btang dang / me mdaga' bar ba mi bzad pas ni 'obs rnams bkang ba dang // kha zas dag ni myur du gdug pa'i dug dang sbyar ba yi// de la sdig pa'i las
252a3: can khyod ni rtsa bar nges pa yin/ / khyod nyid dpung bcas bu dang lhan cig sder bcas 'ongs nas su// dbasad phyir ni mda' bo che dang ral gri mda' mang thogs/ 'on kyang 'dir ni khyod kyis nga'i sku gcig ma g.yos
252a4: na/ ci phyir khyod ni rgyags par gyur na sad dung 'dug/ ji snyed bdud ni stong phrag bye ba rgol du yang btsud kyang // sems can bye ba khrag khrig dag ni 'dir yang lhags nas su// zhing kun rab tu gang bar 'dug pa
252a5: nga'i dbang yin te/ / da ni khyod phyir mchog tu byams pa'i yid kyis gnas par bya/ da ni snying rje'i gnas te 'gro ba rjes su 'dzin byed pa// khyod ni shin tu gtum po nga la rtag tu bgegs byed de// thub pa'i dbang po
252a6: khru mchog 'di dag nga'i dbang yin gyis/ / da ltar tha ma'i dus ni sangs rgyas mdzad pa bya// rnam thar sems kyis sems can rnams kyi don yang spyad par bya// smras par gyur kyang bzod pa yongs su gtang bar
252a7: mi bya'o/ / nga la ma dog tha ba rab tu khro ba'i yid med de// khyed ni rjes su gzung phyir nga nyid rtag tu mngon par brtson// nga la gsol dang khyod yid ni rgyar 'jig rten gsum dag tu// mchog tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi
252a8: bdud rtsi bshad par nga / / de phyir khyod kyi sdig pa'i las rnams med par rab 'gyur gyis// 'jig rten mgon po nga la yid ni myur du dad par byos// khyod ni rtag tu 'di na gnod pa bya bar rab sems kyang // khyod

252b1: dgrol phyir ni nga snying rtag tu byams par rab tu dang / sdig pa'i blo gros bor la dang bcas yid la byos shig dang // ring por mi thogs khyod ni byang chub tu yang lung bstan to// de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan
252b2: 'das la rab tu 'khros te 'khrugs shing rngam nas de nas slar 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / bdag gi mgul pa bcing ba lngas bcings pa snyam du shes te/ 'jigs skrag pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'dod kyang de ma nus nas/ bcom
252b3: ldan 'das dkrongs pa'i phyir rang 'khros pa'i mthus shin du tsha ba yi dbugs btang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs de shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i me tog du mngon par sprul to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi
252b4: s hing thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes te chos kyang ston pa de thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la shin du yid du 'ong ba'i gdugs su byin gyis
252b5: brlabs so/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la gsol pa/ me tog gi gdugs 'di dag ga la mchis
252b6: su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lags/ / bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
252b7: g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes pa de rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sngon gyi smon lam gyis bla na med pa yang
252b8: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de da ltar bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa/

253a1: dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad mthon por byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rgyud thams cad dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi sgron ma yun ring du gnas par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
253a2: cad rnam par 'phel ba'i brtson 'grus kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs byed pa/ dgra dad pas kyis rgol ba thams cad shin du tshar gcod par byed pa/ ngo mtshar dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / brtsod pa dang /
253a3: rmi lam ngan pa dang / bltas ngan pa dang / mu ge dang / 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang / 'thab pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / 'ching ba dang / zab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin par grang zhing tsha ba dang //
253a4: rlung dang tsha ba dang nad dang / sgra mi snyan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par byed pa rgyal rigs thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs
253a5: pa/ rigs bzhi thams cad chos kyi don la 'dzud pa/ shes rab kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar byed pa/ lam drang por rab tu ston pa khyim dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / pho brang
253a6: 'khor dang / yul 'khor thams cad 'dun par byed pa/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / nyin par dang / mtshan mo dang / zla ba gcig dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus dang lo thams cad 'thun par byed pa lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang /
253a7: 'bru dang / sman thams cad grub par byed pa/ bzod dang / las kyi mtha' dang / gnas dang byin gyi rlabs dang / dgos pa thams cad grub par byed pa/ lus dang ga dang // yid kyi nyes pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa rigs pa
253a8: dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / mos pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtan pa dang / bzod pa dang / spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i snang bas rab tu sad par byed pa/ 'phags pa'i rigs

253b1: bzhis chos kyi tshul byin gyis rlob pa/ theg pa chen po ston par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ sems can chen po rnams dbugs byin pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rdo rje lta bu'i sems byin
253b2: gyis rlob pa/ sa bcu la yang dag par 'jug par byed pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa khong du chud par byed pa/ dbang bskur ba'i chos dang / byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa/ gdul ba'i sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin pa/
253b3: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos khyab par byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzud pa/ bla na med pa'i lam la yang dag par 'jog par byed pa/ chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa
253b4: chos kyi ros sems can rnams tshim par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ bdud bzhi'i yul las rab tu thar par byed pa/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
253b5: dbyings su 'jog par byed pa/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi snying po sa lus 'jogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'chad pa bzhed do// 'das
253b6: p a'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig
253b7: rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsungs so/ / byin gyis brlabs so// gcig la gcig dgyes so// da lngar phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
253b8: p a'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung

254a1: ngo byin gyis rlob po/ / gcig la gcig dgyes par mdzad do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
254a2: rgyas gang dag 'byung ba de dag kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu'i chos kyi snying pos lus yongs su 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzung sa dang phyag rgya dang tshig dbu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung bar 'gyur ro/ / byin gyis rlob
254a3: par 'gyur ro/ / gcig la gcig dgyes par mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yod pa de dag so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la yongs
254a4: su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sngon ma thos pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa/ gang
254a5: 'di ltar yon tan mang po bgyid pa/ 'di ltar yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i snang ba bgyid pa nas zhi ba'i bar du bgyid pa de gang lags chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje
254a6: lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa/ bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa nas/ phung po'i lhag
254a7: ma mchis pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bgyid pa de skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang
254a8: lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//

254b1: rigs kyi bu dag ded kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der 'dod do// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
254b2: khams gzhan dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'chol ga zhes pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun
254b3: drabadar nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
254b4: da dang ldan cig sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / ngan pa stod pa las bzlog pa dang / babang po'i spyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / blan med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos mnyam
254b5: nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab du dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur/ byin gyis brlob par 'gyur/ gcig la gcig
254b6: rjes su dgyes par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs kyis bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
254b7: gyis bltas te/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur gyis// khyed
254b8: las gang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'ams pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phrag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

255a1: tshad med grangs med pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dus gcig du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na bzhugs pa de dag la mchod pa bya ba dang / chos de yang nyan pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad//
255a2: dang lha'i yul dang / bdud kyi yul thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan bkod pa de dag la blta ba dang / sangs rgyas mang po 'dus pa sngon ma mthong ma thos pa blta bar 'dod pa de dag dang / de deng lhan cig tu 'jig
255a3: rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gal ba der 'dod do/ / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems
255a4: dpa' chen po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzungs 'di 'chad pa na/ gal te bdag cag gis gnas rnyed cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang
255a5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar tshogs pa de dag la yang phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / chos nyan par rngo thog pa blta na de bzhin du bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs
255a6: p a dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i
255a7: gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa'i slad du mchis te/ der bdag cag gis dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa
255a8: zhig bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa rnams la mchod par bgyi'o de dag las chos kyang mnyan par bgyi'o/ / der bdag cag gis rdzu 'phrul gyis yul bkod pa pa ni ma 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed legs par rgyan pa de yang blta bar bgyi/ 'dus pa chen

255b1: lo bkod pa de dag kyang blta bar bgyi'o/ / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so na rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces
255b2: bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams dar 'jug pa'i gnas dang / go skabs kyi phyir de ltar the tshom ma za zhig/ de ltar nem nur ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
255b3: rnams kyi zhing du 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa ni mtha' yas so/ / rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de thabs mkhas pa chen po dang ldan pas/
255b4: go skabs yangs so// rigs kyi bu dag yongs su brtag pa bzung ste sems can gang la la sems can gyi khams su bsdu bar bsdus pa khams dang skye mched las gnas pa sems can de dag gal te re re'i lus kyang
255b5: ri rab tsam du gyur tu zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sems can lus de lta bur gyur pa de dag thams cad yungs 'bru gcig gi nang du chud par nus so/ / sems can re re zhing yang yul dang gnas
255b6: kyi skabs yangs te sems can de dag phan tshun du mig rgyang gis kyang mi slobs so/ / yungs 'bru gcig tu sems can thams cad kyi lus bcug kyang bri ba dang gang bar mi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa
255b7: shAkya thab pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no/ / rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang sra pa nyid ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sa'i khams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sa'i khams thams cad rdul gcig
255b8: gi steng du 'jog nus la rdul de gcig gi steng du sa'i khams thams cad bzhag kyang bri ba 'am gang bar mi mngon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa da lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan
255b9: yang gang chung bad gsher bar snang ba de thams cad ni chu'i khams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des chu'i khams de thams cad skra'i rtse mo gcig tu chud par nus la skra'i rtse mo gcig tu chu'i khams de

256a1: thams cad bcug kyang bri ba 'am gang bar mi mngon no/ / rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang ji tsam du dro bar snang ba de thams cad ni me'i khams te/ me'i khams gang sngon byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba
256a2: de thams cad rdul phra rab gcig tu chud par nus la me'i khams de thams cad rdul phra rab de gcig tu bcug kyang gnas shin du yangs te/ rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang gang chung zad rlung
256a3: gi khams su snang ba'i rlung gi khams de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des pa spu'i khung bu gcig tu 'jug nus la/ rlung gi khams de thams cad ba spu'i khung bu de gcig tu bcug kyang gnas shin du
256a4: yangs te/ rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des ni gang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi sems can thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi
256a5: po de dag thams cad dang / lhan cig tu rdul gcig gi stong du 'jog par nus te/ rdul gcig la sems can de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po de dag dang bcas par rang gi yul gyi las kyis mtha' rnams spyod
256a6: kyang gnas shin du yangs par rgyu ste/ phan tshun gnod pa yang med la rdul gcig gi rtse mo de yang med la rdul gcig gi rtse mo de yang bri ba 'am gang bar yang mi mngon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni
256a7: thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no/ / rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi skye mched drug dang / spyod pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / smon lam dang / byin gyi rlabs dang / tshig gi
256a8: lam gyi sgra dang / yi ge dang / tshig brjod pa dang 'du byed gsum gyis las kyi mtha'i bya ba dang / phung po dang / dpyod pa dang / bsags pa'i bya ba tha dad pa ji snyed pa dang / gang yang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi

256b1: mtha' mu nas bzung ste/ dus gsum du gtogs pa'i 'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba na srid pa 'grub pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba 'byung ba dang / sa'i khams kyi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad
256b2: kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i skad cig thang gcig yud tsam 'das pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum
256b3: du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod pa dang / kun tu spyod pa dang // bde ba dang / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des skad
256b4: cig gcig la rab tu mkhyen te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pas mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing lhun
256b5: gyis grub pa dus gsum gyi mtha' yongs su mkhyen to/ / rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pas mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can yongs su
256b6: smin par byed pa'i thabs tshad med pa 'di lta bu dang ldan no/ / mtshan nyid bshad pa 'di lung bstan pa na phyogs tha dad pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dag gi so so'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong grangs
256b7: me dpag tu med pa dag smon lam gyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/ / 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs pag mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // bas po drug pa// yang de'i tshe shar
256b8: p hyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang thabs cig tu sangs

257a1: rgyas kyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis gshegs par chas nas/ skad cig gcig tsam la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon to// de bzhin gshegs
257a2: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas pad ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang rang gi rdza
257a3: 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas pad ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba de dag la 'khod do/ / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa'i rdul
257a4: tharab kyi rdul snyed kyang skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa re re yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po
257a5: grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang thabs gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de ga la bzhugs par byon to// byon nas kyang pad
257a6: mi'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba rnams la bzhugs so/ / yang de'i tshe na lho phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba byon nas pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// de bzhin du byang phyogs logs nas
257a7: de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba byon nas pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs so/ / yang de'i tshe nub phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med ces bya ba byon nas pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o/ 'og gi
257a8: phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byon nas pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o/ / steng gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba byon nas/ byang chub

257b1: s ems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dang thabs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad
257b2: rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs par chas pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom/
257b3: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas/ pad ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ji ltar rang gi bsod
257b4: nams dang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis pad ma'i gdan sprul pa rnams la 'bod do/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod/
257b5: pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi char phab bo// gong du smos pa bzhin sbyar te la la dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par bskor bar byas so// la la dag gis ni chos nyan pas bskor
257b6: nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'khod do/ / la la dag ni rang gi dge ba'i phyogs yid la byed cing gnas so// yang de'i tshe na rab 'byor gzhon nur gyur pas thal mo sbyar te rang gi rdzu
257b7: 'phrul gyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so// the tsom thams cad gcod mdzad pa// thub pa zla ba
257b8: kun nas gshegs/ / sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa'i/ dge 'dun phun sum tshogs 'di snang // byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gang bas/ zhing 'di mchod rten gyur pa ste//

258a1: zhing rnams kun gyis phyag byas so// gang na sems can smad pa yi/ zhing ni snyigs ma lnga ldan 'dir/ thub pa snang mdzad rgyu med par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas der mi gshegs// de ring bdud ngan ma' gcad
258a2: cing / nag po'i phyogs ni rab gzhom dang // spyod pa dge ba bsdu ba'i phyir// de'i don du kun nas gshegs// yid ni rab tu dang byos la// bdud sde rab tu 'jom pa yi// chos nyid zhi ba ra ba nyon la/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
258a3: 'gyur bar byos/ / theg pa chen po spyod pa'i lam// bzod pa'i go bgos shes par byos// nyon mongs thams cad zad bya'i phyir// gzungs 'di de ring mnyan par byos// gdan rnams la ni bzhugs nas ni// bsrung ba 'di ni bshad
258a4: gsol phyir/ / de phyir thams cad mgrin gcig phyir// 'dren pa rnams ni spyan drongs shig/ dam chos yun ring gnas bya'i phyir// bsgrib pa thams cad zhi byed pa// chos rnams thams cad sdud pa yi// gzungs 'di gzhan
258a5: gyis mi thub bo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa thob pa grangs med dpag tu med pa de snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pad ma'i gdan
258a6: 'di dag la bzhugs te deng thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis byams pa chen po'i mchog dang bzod pa yongs su bsgoms pa mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bshad pa chos thams cad sdud pa/ / 'jigs dang bral ba
258a7: la 'jug pa/ bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das par bgyid pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu stsol la/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bgyid pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa/ dgra thams cad
258a8: char gcod pa/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar par bgyid pa// thams cad bsrung ba bla na med pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams

258b1: cad kyi chos thams cad dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa mi brjed pa dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa kun ston pa/ bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skye mched
258b2: dang byin gyi rlabs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa la 'dug pa/ snang ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa la 'jug pa nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcurtsa bdun gyi snying po 'dzin pa'i
258b3: bar gyi gzungs 'di sems can rnams kyi gzi brjid dang / kha dog dang / longs spyod dang / stobs dang / grags pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa dang / spobs pa dang / dran pa rnam par 'phel ba dang / thos pa 'dzin
258b4: pami brjed pa dang / dgra thams cad pham par bgyid pa dang / me tog mngon par 'grub pa dang / bslab pa 'dzin pa dang / dran pa'i snod du 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub yang dag
258b5: par thob par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzungs 'di de 'dir bdag cag la gshang du gsol/ / chos kyi tshul rjes su gzung ba dang / yun ring du gnas pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi
258b6: rigs chung mi 'dza' ba dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam mtha' dag bstan pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / nam mkha' dang de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa dang / mun pa dang / snang ba dang / dmigs pa dang / ma dmigs pa dang /
258b7: tshu rol dang / pha rol dang / rtogs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa dang / chos thams cad mi ba dang / mi 'byung ba dang / mi 'gag
258b8: mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dngos pos mamachis shing yang dag pa'i mtha' dbyer ma mchis pa dang / sa dang chu dang med/ rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

259a1: thams cad kyis 'dir bdag cag la chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ / gang 'dir thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag la dkon
259a2: mchog gsum mngon sum du gyur cig/ sems can rnams phan tshun du dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid cing phan par bgyid par gyur cig/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
259a3: pa'i byang chuchu sems bskyed pa dang / phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / lung bstan pa thob par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis kyang chos bstan pa'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang
259a4: nas pad ma'i snying po de dag la bzhugs so/ / ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa'i phyir
259a5: dran pa dang / dang ba dang / dad pa dang / mos pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba
259a6: rnams la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / lta ba ngan pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la blta ba dang / the tsom dang / nye bar len pa dang // srid pa'i sred pa kun gzhi'i nyes
259a7: pa dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can so so'i nas 'di snyam du bdag gcig pu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug gi 'di na gzhan ni su yang med do// bdag gcig pu la de bzhin
259a8: gshegs pa'i thugs thams cad kyis dgongs te nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par bzhed do/ / 'di na gzhan sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gsol pa ma btab po

259b1: snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi smon lam mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / yang de'i tshe gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir gtogs pa'i sems/
259b2: can rnams dbang po thams cad bstan te thal mo sbyar nas de dag gis 'grin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol// btsun pa bcom
259b3: ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nan tan gyis bsdu bar bgyi'o// de nas yang de'i tshe de bzhin
259b4: g shegs pa shAkya thub pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams la mchod pa'i phyir spos bkod pa las shin du lhag pa'i spos gong du mchog tu khyad par du gyur pa rgya chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing
259b5: 'di thams cad khyab par byin gyis brlabs so/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lhag ma rnams mchod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi lag pa rin po che dang /
259b6: me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub sna tshogs dag gis gang bar byin gyis brlabs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// da
259b7: ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dri ba'i phyir byon pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ bdag sngon gyi smon
259b8: lam gyis 'di 'dra bar rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sems can bsam pa

260a1: nyams pa/ las rab du stor ba/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dang rab rib kyi ling tog gis nyon mongs pa'i mun par bcug pa/ ngan song gsum du zhugs pa/ mi dge ba dang 'grogs pa/ dge ba thams cad dang bral/
260a2: mkhas pa thams cad kyis yongs su spangs pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ snying rje med pa'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i slad du snying
260a3: brtse ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi brtson pa chen pos grang ba dang / dro ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / dal ba dang / chad pa dang du blang bar bgyi 'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / yul 'khor du rkang gis
260a4: 'gro bar bya'o/ / sems can la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du rtsub pa dang / nyung ba dang / ro med pa shin tu smad pa mi mthun pa'i zas bza' bar bgyi'o// de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i slad du sbom pa rtsub pa/ reg na mi bde ba/ shan dang
260a5: shing bal dang / so ma'i ras dang / phyag dar khrod kyi gos bgo bar bgyi'o// ri dang / ri sul dang / nags sdug po dang / grong stong dang / dur khrod du gnas par gyi ba na sardza'i mal cha dang / gso ma dang / shing gi 'dab ma dang / rtsub
260a6: pa dri mi zhim pa/ reg na mi bde ba'i mal cha spyad par bgyi'o// bdag gi thabs mkhas pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos nas sems can rnams la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs bgyi ste/ rgyal rigs rnams
260a7: la ni rgyal srid dang / dbang phyug gi gtam bgyi 'o bram ze rnams la ni rig byed dang skar ma'i gtam dang / blon po rnams la ni yul dang las kyi mtha'i gtam dang / sman pa rnams la ni khams dang / sman dang / bsgrub pa'i gtam
260a8: dang / tshong pa rnams la ni nye tshong gi gtam dang / dmangs rnams la ni las kyi mtha' la mngon par zhen pa'i gtam dang / bud med rnams la ni kha dog dang / rgyan dang bu dang / phyug pa dang / 'gran zla med pa'i gtam dang // dge sbyong rnams

260b1: pa ni bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / las gsum la brtson pa'i gtam bgyi'o// sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du ma thob pa thob par bgyi ba dang / mngon du ma bgyis pa mngon du bgyi bar bzung ngo // mthar pa rnams rab
260b2: kuthar bar bgyi ba'i slad du sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs la spro bar bgyi'o/ / sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du yul thams cad du rgyu bar bgyi'o// de lta mod kyi sems can 'di dag ni den bdag la gsheg ma snyan
260b3: bzer ro/ phrag dog gi chos kyi rgyus bdag la 'khrig pa'i chos kyis med pa la skur pa 'debs so// kha gsag dang / tshul 'tshas pa dang / spu dang g.yo dang / brdzun smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa dang / bud med kyi tshig dag gis bskur ba
260b4: 'debs so/ / bdag la sas 'thor ro// bdag la gsad pa'i phyir mtshon dang / dug dang / me dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' bo che dang / mnga' dang / ral gri dang / mdung dang / dgra sta dang / rdo dang / mtshon cha'i char 'bebs so// bdag bsad
260b5: ba'i phyir glang po che dang / sbrul sdug pa dang seng ge dang / sta ga dang / glang dang / ma he dang / spyang gi dang / phag rgod dang / tshan po che rnams kyang 'gyed do// bdag gis gnas dang / gnas khang dang / gtsug lag khang yang mi gtsang
260b6: ba dang / dri nga bas 'gengs so// bdag gi nyan thos kyi grong khyer du bzhugs pa rnams la 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis gru dang / gar tshul ma yin pa byed du 'dzud do// thabs brgya stong du mas bdag bsad pa'i
260b7: phyir brtson no/ / bdag gi bstan pa nub par bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul gyi sgron ma gsad pa dang / chos kyi gru gzhig pa dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bskal ba dang / bdag gi chos kyi mchod sbyin rnam par gtor ba'i phyir brtson no//
260b8: dasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos kyi tshul la gzigs te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga

261a1: dang ldan pa 'dir 'dus pa chen po mdzad nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs gnas btsun/
261a2: mi 'chad par bgyi ba dang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / dgra dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas chang gcad pa dang / sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang
261a3: mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshegs dang / 'ching ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rgol ba dang / dus ma yin par grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / char ba dang / rlung dang lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis nyes pa dang / lta ba ngan pa yang ba rab tuni
261a4: b.rabagyi ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par bgyi'o// khyim dang/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul khor thams cad bsrung ba dang / g.yod nga/ dug dang /
261a5: byad dang / rmongs byed dang rmi lam ngan pa dang / bltas ngan pa thams cad gzhil ba dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / bcud thams cad kyis sems can nye bar 'tsho bar bgyi ba dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram/
261a6: ze dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje'u rigs rnams dge ba spyod pa la gzung ba dang / byang chub kyi sems rab du bskyed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
261a7: thabs shes pa la mkhas pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtan pa dang / spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / dbang bskur ba'i sar dbugs dbyung ba la 'dzud cing ye
261a8: s hes kyi pha rol du 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu la brtan pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms

261b1: zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad cing byin gyis brlabs te/ gcig la gcig dgyes pa de 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar
261b2: phyogs bcun bzhugs shing 'tshol ba zhes pa dag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir dri ba'i phyir gshegs te bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsrung ba'i slad du chos mnyam
261b3: p anyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas pa bgyi ba
261b4: dang / bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / ji ltar gong du rgyas par brjod pa bzhin du sgrib pa med pa ye shes kyi pha rol du 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis gsol ba btab pa la thugs brtse
261b5: bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas shing phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs
261b6: rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / chos kyi bcud kyis sems can thams cad nye bar 'tshe bar bgyi ba'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol/ byin gyis brlab du gsol/ bshad nas kyang phan tshun rjes su dgyes par mdzad du
261b7: gi sol/ / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ de bzhin du bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi ning 'di sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lags kyang kyi ste/ tsho kyi tshul yun ring gnas par gyi
261b8: b dud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab du gzhom pa nas bsgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i bar gyi slad du byin gyis brlab cing chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus

262a1: ' joms pa zhes bya'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad kyis gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad nyon
262a2: cig 'di lta ste/ a kar/ oM ka ra/ b+ha ka ra/ pra b+ha ka ra/ b+ha ya me ha/ mi tra ma b+his// a khe a kha a b.re/ do ma do mad te/ ke ba Te/ ke yur/ sa ma ba can/ sa man ta b+hatre/ d+harme d+harme d+harma ke/ dza pa le/ me tra a nu pa le/ pa lab te/
262a3: ga Ne ga Ne ba rAn te/ hi le hi li/ hi li hi le ke/ dza ma b+ha ba te/ Ta ka Te/ Ta ka ba rAn te/ hi rin te/ shi rin te/ bin du ba te/ go b+ha ha/ dzur me tra/ dzur dzu ke/ a gre a ba me/ sa s+ya ta ThA tAn/ hu lu hi le tsan tre/ sa ma d+hi/ rme d+hama?/ ku tsu ru/ mur+tha
262a4: a tsid tra/ tsi li tsi li li/ tsa ba ha/ tsu lu tsu lu/ mi tra ba ha/ ku lu ku lu sa ra sa ra/ ku Tu ku Ta/ ma hA sa ra sa ra/ tu nutra Tu/ ma hA sa t+ya hr-id ya buHswa puSh+pe/ d+hum ba re tar/ a b+ha ye/ ru tsi na ka ra k+She/ a ya ma s+ya/ ba baha
262a5: ti la/ ma ma le/ pha shwa kha shi shi ra shi shi ra/ lo ka bi nA ya ka/ badz+re badz+re d+ha re badz+ra ba te/ badz+re ma te/ badz+re da de/ tsakra badz+re/ tsa kre tsa ba te/ d+ha re d+ha re b+ha re b+ha re pU re Ta re/ hu hu re/ b+ha ga baM ba re sha ra sha tsa tsi li tsu ru phu re/ ma Na Na Nal/ maN Da ne/ ga
262a6: gar Ni/ mA tra te ne/ sarba mu ha ne/ d+hi d+hi ra ya ne/ ma khe shar la ya ne re'i ni dza ne d+hi ba ba tsi/ tsan Ta la se me/ sarba sas+ya a d+hiSh+Than/ a tsin d+yan tu ma hA nAM/ ni ne bA la re ta/ o tse gr-i/ bi tsi ni/ ba nar ha/ bu bu / gu ru gu ru/ mu ru mun
262a7: hi li hi li/ ha la ha la/ ka kAn ta ba ha hi hi tam/ a yu ha na kaN Da dz+wa la b+ha se gad ne/ a ta ha ni/ marga a b+hi ri ha ni/ pa la sa t+ye/ a roSha ba ti/ hi li hi le/ ya tha ba dza ya swa kra ya tha ba ra Na tsa hr-i da ya ba ha sa t+ya ba ri b+hA pa marga a b+he
262a8: ro ha ne/ a tsa la bud d+hi dang pra tsa la ba tsa ya/ ba Na Da krid ya/ tsan dra tsa ra ha a tsa le sho d+ha ni/ pra kre ni marge/ i li i li le/ pra b+ha sar pra te sarba tra thA ta/ sat+ya a nu ga te/ a na pa ra Na pra te aM la tha a gu sha mi ni mi bra h+maH/

262b1: yo ha/ a hi ta/ a b+ha hi/ ni ba ra ya ba/ a tsi ra mA rga/ lan la rgu sa re/ tri rad na bad she/ d+harma kA ya/ dza la ts+tsha na dre/ sa mu dra ba ti/ ma hA da b+hA ta bya ya/ sa mu dra be ga ba d+ha ra Ne/ mu dre Na/ ma khi mu dra/ su ra pra ti sam bid ta/ sa mu tra/
262b2: a brta ni saM mo ha/ skA ra bi d+hA ta ra se k+Shi ti/ mu dr-i to sa/ ye ke tsid bri ti b+hi ba ha/ ba ha ba ha ba ha/ ke Ta/ ka baT/ sha la pra tIta? hr-i da ye na mu dre tA d+ha ra Ne ne/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ dAn ti la huk+Sha sarba hrid ya/ mu tri to si/ dzu da du dza bdaH
262b3: dza kha ba ta/ su ma ti pa ti ma hA ad b+hU ta mu tri ta ye ke tsid/ Sha Da ya tan ni shre tra b+hU ta/ e na mi ne sa tsa ne/ go Sha sa tsa ne mu tri tra/ Ar+ya a d+hiSh+TAn b+ha ba thA na/ n+ya tha ma hA bu ma n+ye sa suts+tsha ya/ a ba tA ra/ ma hA kA ru Na ya/
262b4: mu tri ta sarba sa ma myag pra ti pad tsi ra d+ha dran dz+wa la tu/ d+harma ne/ tri sarba mu ni b+ha'i b+ha/ ma hA kA ru Na/ sa mA d+hi/ dz+nyA na la b+ha pa le/ na me tri tag a b+hi pa r+ya pa le na a d+hiSh+Tha ta/ sarba b+hU ta u pa tsa yA ya swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe
262b5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad 'di skad ces sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ phyag 'tshala'o// ngas rgyas thams cad laphyag 'tshal lo// zhes
262b6: lan gsum smras nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ / kye ma'o thub pa 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o// kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o//
262b7: kye ma'o chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'ojoms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston pa'i bstan pa thams cad
262b8: kyekyi tshul gyi dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs kyi byin gyi brlabs ston pa/ bdud kyi yul gyi stobs rnam par 'joms pa/ bdud kyi zhags pa kun gcod pa/ dgra thams cad tshar gcod pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan

263a1: bsgreng ba chos kyi phyogs bsrung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar/ rmad du byung ba/ sngon ma thos pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis snying po dang / phyag
263a2: rgya dang / 'byung ba chen po thams cad dang / 'du byed dang / skye mched drag yongs su sbyar bar bya ba nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir da ltar sangs rgyas
263a3: bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do// gzungs lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems
263a4: dpa' chen po gang gA'i klung sum bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed dag gzungs mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / yang de'i tshe zla ba 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/
263a5: kun du rnam par bltas nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir thams cad dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal ba zla ba rnams kyi 'khor
263a6: 'di 'dra ba ni rnyed par dka'/ byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs che// mkhas pa 'dir ni rnyed par dka'// gang 'di thugs rje ldan pa yi// mgon pos chos tshul byin brlabs pa// phyag rgya 'di 'dra thos pa yang / mchog
263a7: rnyed par dka' ba'o/ / bdud kyi phyogs rnams thams cad dang // dgra rnams kyang ni pham byed pa// dkon mchog gsum rkun mi 'chad pa rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs// sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyi
263a8: bzed dang nges pa rab 'phel gsams can rnams kyang bdun byed pa/ / rgyal po dang ni yul 'khor skyong // 'di na ngan byas zlog byed pa// lta ba ngan pa rab 'gog pa// byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa// byang chub lam yang

263b1: rab ston pa/ / pha rol phyin pa 'phel byed pa// bzang po spyod pa rdzogs byed pa// thabs dang ye shes spobs pa rnams// 'phel bar bya phyir byin gyis brlabs// dkar po'i phyogs ni sngar byed pa// gzungs 'di gzhan gyis mi nu
263b2: pa/ byang chub lam las mi g.yo ba// chos kyi dbang rnams 'bar byed pa'i// gzungs la yid gnyis thams cad ni// bsal nas lhag par mos par byos// gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur pa// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i lam yin no//
263b3: chos sma rnams ni bsrung ba dang nyan pa mngon par 'phel bya'i phyir// gzhan gyis mi thug pa 'i gzungs// bdag gisar yang bshad par bya// sgrib pa med pa 'grub pa dang // sems can rnams kyi phan 'phel phyir// byang chub
263b4: sems dpa' grags chen po/ / su dag 'di la dad pa 'bul// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nur gyur pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag kyang
263b5: gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul byin gyis brlob po/ / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis khrus byas te// gos gtsang ma bgos la me tog
263b6: sa tshogs pa'am pa/ spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs pa/ ro thob sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ras dang rgyan dang ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / padan bsgreng bas shin tu brgyan
263b7: pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su seng ge'i khri regan 'jam pa la 'dug ste/ gzungs 'di yang dag par bshadan su yang de'i sems 'khrug pa 'am/ khams 'khrug pa 'am/ lus 'khrug pa 'am/ yid 'khrug par mi byed do// de'i lus
263b8: lasu yang dbugs mi gtong ngo / / glang pa na bar byed mi nus so// mig na ba dang / lcen pa dang / son pa dang / rus pa na pa dang / mgul ba na ba dang / dpung pa na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / num na pa dang / ljon pa dang / chu son pa dang / brlan pa

264a1: ba dang / byin pa na par byed sus kyang mi nus te/ de ni gnas med do// de'i skad 'gag par yang mi 'gyur ro// chos smra ba de sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las kyis khams 'khrug pa 'am// skad 'gag pa par gyur na yang des gzungs
264a2: 'di lags na thams cad ma lus par zhi bar 'gyur te/ las yongs su byang nas bde bar 'gyur ro// chos nyan pa gang dag der 'du bar 'gyur ba de dag la yang su yang khams 'khrug pa 'am/ skad 'gags par byed par mi 'gyur ro/
264a3: gang dag de na gzungs 'di nyan pa de dag kyang mi dge ba'i las kyis yun ring por na ba dang / khams 'khrug pa dang / skad 'gags pa de thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas
264a4: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag la dgongs su gsol gzungs
264a5: 'di la dad pa stsal du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ kha shan te/ a sa mA bo me tre som pa te/ e hi da ba kun rde gan pa kun dza pe/ mu la sho d+hi ne/ bta Sha/ ba ha kha mA ra pa ta thA tA ba ri chod pa ha sa ba ha sa/ a mu la/ a tsa le/ tsaN le/ pra
264a6: d+ha le/ e ka na yas pa ri tshed/ tsaN DiN bo ra satri Na kha ga su ra ti Ne/ pUta ko rje ba ri med/ rda la kha/ dzal kha ba ye/ dza la nA ma kha sho/ kha ka ka la ha ha ha ha/ du ru spa Sha bed na pa ri tshad na/ a ma mA nAm ma ma a mu tra/ mu dra ba/ khas
264a7: s+yA rnam pa chedan No d+hi me drA/ ti ba sa ma hA bi mahA ta ko Tim klas par chod kA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad dru gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen pa/
264a8: de ga dang / pargya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig tan skyed pa dang / lce dang / klu dang / gno skyid dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'amaci dang / lto phye chen po'i dbang po de dag dang / sems can gzi brdzu

264b1: bde dag thams cad kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang 'di skad du/ kye ma gzungs 'di ni stobs che ba drag shul dang ldan pa ste/ dgra thams cad bzlog pa/ 'jigs pa dang /
264b2: nang dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / bltas ngan pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar byed pa nas bsgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang / bsod nams dang ye shes chen po de bsags pa/ bla na med pa'i ye she kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i ba
264b3: kyi gzungs 'di bshad do zhes bka' stsal to/ / yang de'i tshe tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ lha'i las 'das pa'i gos dang / spung pa dang / brgyad dang /
264b4: tog dang / spos dang / phrad pa dang / bug pa dang / rgyan chen po mchog rnams kyis lus brgyan nas bud med kyi gzugs su bsgyur te/ tshangs pa chen po'i sto/ sa kyi yul bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das
264b5: da bzhin gshegs pa chod pag mad kyi spyan sdang 'dug go/ / de nas changs pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug san las langs nas/ thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom
264b6: l dan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi rkang ma lus pa 'dir dbyangs kyis go bar bgyi ba la dang bdag la bgegs cung zad kyang mi 'byung bar dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa dam
264b7: par gdon pa 'jal ba bstan par bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol/ bdag gis da ltar chos smrab rnams dang / chos nyan pa rnams kyi slad du 'di 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsrung ba bshad par bgyi ste/
264b8: ci nas slad ma'i dus na bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor tam lha 'am/ gru'am/ gru mo 'am/ klu rgan po 'am/ khru rgan mo'am/ klu'i 'khor tam/ klu'i 'khor ba 'am/ klu'i bu po 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ de bzhin du rgyas par bgyi

265a1: ste/ shaza'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha za rgan po 'am/ sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor tam/ sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/ sha za'i za'am/ sha za bu mo 'am/ mi 'am ma mngags pa'i bar gang la la chos smra ba rnams dang /
265a2: chos nyan pa rnams la thugs blta ba 'am/ skabs tshal ba'i dgra phyir rgol bzhig mchis te/ than chos smra ba 'am/ chos nyan par rnams kyi sgra'i khang brag cig tsam la yang 'tshe ba 'am/ gnod par bgyi dang ma/ 'jig par
265a3: bgyid dam/ mdangs 'phrog gam/ lus la dbugs chen po stong ngam/ tha na skad cig gcig tsam yang sdang ba'i sems kyis bltan/ bdag gis bdud nas mi dang / mi ma lags pa'i bar de dag bzlog pa dang chad pas ga6
265a4: pa dang / tshar gcad pa dang / rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / mongs par bgyi// blo rtsal bar bgyi na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis gang bar bgyi
265a5: bar dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khoraHtshig brjod pa byin gyis brlab du gsol/ / 'di la su zhig bdag gi grogs su gyur/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis cang mi gsung bar gyur
265a6: pas gnang bar mdzad do/ / de nas brgya byin gtsug 'dzin ces bya ba 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi rgyan gyi 'od kyis lus brgyan nas ha cang yang mi ring bzhig tu 'dug go// de nas brgya byin gtsug pud 'dzin kyis tshangs pa
265a7: phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ / che zhe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi spyan sngar ma 'dug shig/ che zhe 'di rabag med par ma byed cig/ bcom ldan 'das lam 'tshe shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
265a8: byas pa rnams la spos la dga'// de bzhin gshegs la spros mi mda'// de dag skye 'jig mtshan nyid kyi// 'dus byas dag kyang ston pa mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzungs dang / yi ge dang / tshigasadud bye ba thams ca

265b1: kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshul brnyes pa ste/ / che zhes de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di lta ste// nam mkha' dang / mnyam pa nyid du gcig pas de bzhin nyid la 'gal bar mi mdzad de/ nam mkha' la ni 'du byed gsum gyi 'dzag pa
265b2: mtshan nyid slob tags pa med do/ / ji ltar 'du byed gsum la nam mkha' me tog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'dod pa'i yon tan la spro bar mi mdzad/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
265b3: mi gnas/ mngon par mi zhen te/ de bzhin du srog la ma yin/ skyab po la ma yin// sob b.lam yin skyes bul ma yin gang ma lam yig/ phung po dang // khams dang / skye mched rnams la yang spro bar mi mdzad/ mngon par mi zhen na/
265b4: she khyod kyis ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la spro bar byed de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa lha'i dbang po rtog rtogs te tshig smros shig/ khyod la des mi sdug pa'i 'bras bur gyur terare/ skyes bu dam
265b5: pa chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ / skyes bu dam pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir legs par brgyan nas
265b6: bud med kyi lus su mngon par sprul pa yin gyis 'di la bud med ces tshig tu ma brjod cig/ de nas brgya byin gtsug pud 'dzin gyis tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dgal
265b7: thugs rje bar dgongs te bzod par gsol/ / 'di skad smras pas bdag 'bras bu mi sdug pa thob par ma gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te brgya byin gyis tshig
265b8: de slar ma bshags na/ de'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gal te des ma gshegs su zin na/ tshe rabs brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dod

266a1: pa'i mnga' smad pa bud med kyi dngos po yongs su blangs par 'gyur ro/ / de bas na rigs kyi bu ci nas kyang ngag gi las bsrung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis khyod kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor /
266a2: gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyi rlabs kyi khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis thal mo sbyar te/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas 'di skad ces spras
266a3: so/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
266a4: 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag gi bsam pa la chos kyi tshul 'di yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / chos smra ba rnams dang / chos nyan pa rnams dang / nan tan dang ldan pa rnams
266a5: la 'tsho bar mi 'gyur bar 'dir dang ba srul du gsol/ / gang slad ma'i dus na bdud nas mi dang mi ma lags pa'i bar gyis de dag la 'tshe bar mi bgyid par dang bsrul du gsol// de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshegs pa'i
266a6: dbang phyug gis de dag gis sdang ba'i sems bzlog pa dang / mnas bsgag pa'i phyir dbyangs kyi sgra phyung nas sgra nges 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad gang bar byas so// yang de'i tshe tshangs pa'i dbang po de dag thams cad
266a7: kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/ / bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dang ba 'bul lo// bdag cag nyid kyis kyang phyi ma'i dus na gzung 'di gzung bar bgyi'o rab tu bstan par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos kyang bsrung bar
266a8: bgyi'o/ / chos smra ba dang / nyan pa de dag dang / nan tan dang ldan pa de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan

266b1: thos chen po rnams kyi spyan sngar gzungs 'di la dang pa 'bul gyis skyes bu dam pa gsungs shig/ de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces spras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
266b2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol 'di lta ste/ a ma ye/ bi ma le/ ga ta Sha Ne De/ ha re tsa NeDe/ ma hA tsan De/ tsa me/ ha tsa mye sa mya/ s+tha
266b3: a pa ha/ bi ba hA/ aM ga tsan+na tra/ kha kha mU la pa ri tsha de ya kha sha tsaN De bi shA tsa tsa De/ a brta ni/ sam brta ni saM ka ri ni Ni dza ma b+ha ni/ sta ma b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ u tsaT ni ta ma hA/ ha ma hA ma tA mi gu tsa naM/ kha ga shama?/ a ma le/ a mu la ba
266b4: badz+re/ a sa re kha ba swa hA// gsang sngags 'di las gang 'da' shing // mang po tshogs par mi spyod na// mig mi mthong zhing mgo yang 'gas// yan lag tha dad 'jig par 'gyur// 'di lta ste a tsa tsa a pa ha/ tsa tsa tsu/ khra kha sha tsa TaT
266b5: btsatsAn/ khag tsa tsan tsatsa tsan tsata/ ma la tsa tsa tsa mu la tsa tsa tsa mA mu la tsa tsa ha su ha ma?/ ba u pa ha swA hA/ de nas tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad nas sha za'i dbang po'i bar gyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces
266b6: kyang smras so/ / stobs chen stobs kyi shugs shin du 'jom pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di bshad de/ phan pa ma yin par sems pa'i 'byung po thams cad la zhags pa 'dis btab na de dag 'tsho bar ga la 'gyur/ tshangs
266b7: pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'byung po gang dag sdang pa'i bsam pa can/ snying rje med dpa byas pa mi bzog sems can la 'tshe ba rnams sam/ bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor grags blta zhing
266b8: skabs tshol ba rnams sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dang ba'i rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la skabs tshel du nye bar 'ong ba dang / btsun mo dam pa dang / bu dang bu mo dang / btsun mo'i 'khor

267a1: rnams dang / blon po dang / shor ba dang / yung dam pa dang / 'khor rnams dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge
267a2: bsnyen ma dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa rnams dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma bsam gtan dang / kha ton la 'grus pa rnams dang / zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa rnams la skabs tshol du 'ong zhing tha na sems kyi skad
267a3: cig gcig la spu'i khung zug cig tsam la 'tshe'am/ gnod par byed dam/ 'jigs par byed dam/ mdangs 'phrog gam/ lus la dbugs gtong ngam sdang ba'i sems kyis bltan/ bdud nas mi dang mi ma yin par
267a4: lus dri nga ba de dag gis mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ / de dag gi mig kyang long bar 'gyur ro// snying yang skams par 'gyur ro// sha kra can du 'gyur/ lus rul cing dri nga ba dang / rdzu 'phrul yang yongs su bri bar 'gyur/
267a5: de dag sogs par ltung bar 'gyur/ rlung gis kyang de dag phyogs bzhir gtor bar 'gyur/ rdul gyis kyang yog nas de nyid du sems 'khrugs te 'thoms par 'gyur ro// gang dgasal rgyu ba de dag ni sa'i khung bur
267a6: 'jug par 'gyur te sa'i 'og tu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ / gang dag chu na rgyu ba'i 'byung po sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa
267a7: de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i rgyal rigs nas zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa'i dge slong gi bar la 'tsho'am/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag las 'da' na de dag kyang de bzhin du mgo tshal pa
267a8: bdun du 'gas pa nas de nyid du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ / yang yul gang du bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'byung ba der bdag gis bsrung ba

267b1: dang / bskyab pa dang / swa ba'i slang du spro bar bgyi'o// der chos 'dod pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi'o// sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas sdang ba'i lus srul po'i bar thams cad de nas bsrad par bgyi'o//
267b2: yul ngan 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dras ma lags pa'i char dang / rlung dang grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / nad thams cad slar bzlog par bgyi'o// bde ba dang / 'dum pa dang lo legs pa dang
267b3: dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / 'thun pa rnams bsgrub par bgyi'o// ros smra ba rnams dang chos nyan pa rnams lan dam mchis pa dang / grags pa dang / rnyed pa dang / sti stang chen po nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// yang de'i tshe tshangs pa rten
267b4: po dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa tshangs pa'i nang du ni tshangs pa kun gyis bkur/ bdud kyi nang du ni bdud kun gyis bkur/ brgya byin gyi nang du ni brgya byin
267b5: kun gyis bkur ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam thos kyi bu dang / 'phags skyes pa dang / mig mi bzangs dang / yul 'khor bsrungs dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lha ma yin dang / lha'i dbang po'i nang
267b6: du ni de dag kun gyis bkur ba/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ rgyan dam pas legs par brgyan pa bud med kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/
267b7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lag pa gnyis na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
267b8: de la mig mi 'dzums par bltas te/ gzhan ma yin pa'i dngos po brjod du med pa ci yang ma yin par bltas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye khyod mig mi

268a1: 'dzums par ci yang ma yin pa'i bar dung la ci zhig blta/ ci 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba dang / ci yang ma yin zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yang yod dam/ de bzhin du 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa
268a2: nams yod do zhes bya ba'i ming gi dngos po ni rkyen gyi mtshan nyid do/ / mtshan nyid kyi rkyen ni ma rig pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams nis 'gog pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ma mchis
268a3: pas na de'i slad du ma rig pa zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ marig pa ma mchis na srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis de dag galas skye bar 'gyur/ ci nam mkha' las skye zhes bgyin nam mkha' nyid kyang ma mchis
